lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What are you-- Are you kidnapping somebody over there?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Don't mind me! (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (cheering)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I've sung songs. But there's one art form that I haven't explored... and that's dance.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (singing, VO) D&D, D, D, D, D, D, D, D, D, D, D, D, D&D Beyond, D&D Beyond, D, D, D, D, D, D, D, D, D, D, D, D&D Beyond, D, D, D, D, D, D, D, D, D, D&D Beyond, D&D Beyond! (cheering)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's something.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I wasn't prepared for that.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Some things just have to be expressed with the human body.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Of course.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Wow. So thank you, D&D Beyond, for facilitating that for us and all the good of the internet.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What would you do every week without sponsorships? You would explode.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I would do this at home.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Liam, if you want to talk about that a little further.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: But once in a while, the Raven Queen hands me a sheet of paper to help promote projects, and this week it is Far Cry 5. (clears throat) I got this four minutes ago. Far Cry 5 is available on March 27th on PS4, Xbox One, and PC. Go to farcry.com-- we don't have any computers here-- to learn more and pick up a copy. The latest installment of Far Cry is set in fictional Hope County, Montana, where a fanatical doomsday cult known as the Project at Eden's Gate has taken control. You are the hero of the story in a thrilling world that hits back with every punch and where the places you discover and the locals you ally with will shape your story in ways you'll never see coming. Also, in celebration of the upcoming release, Nerdist's Dan Casey, Kyle Hill, and Geek & Sundry's own Erika Ishii are filming a special Far Cry 5 training video where they took on challenges players will face in-game.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, that's cool!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Send me some comic books because I'm really bored here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Thank you, Liam.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: As a player of Far Cry 4, it was amazing. I have higher expectations for 5.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The story looks dark.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, it's real good. ATVs, baby! Sorry.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Foster, will be talking-- (cheering)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He did it! Nothing.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I literally brainfarted once and it's like I've always ruined it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, it's been more than once.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: But good friends never let you forget, Matt.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's true.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That is true. Very true.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So check it out next Tuesday. WonderCon coming up. We have a Talks Machina Critical Role panel on Sunday, March 25th at 11:30am in the Arena. So if you guys are in the vicinity and planning to attend WonderCon, please come join us for the panel. We all shall be ridiculous as usual and I don't know if Sam will be up for bringing his box-crotch onesie from Gen Con last year.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe you can do an interpretive dance there as well?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Or turn it into an octagon.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, or a higher faced die. Like an eight-sider or a 12-sider.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's true.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Let's really push the envelope of dick jokes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: There is no end to dick jokes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Thank you so much for being patient. I know it was a wait for a lot of you. It was a joy for me and I hope it was a joy for you. A lot of you were saying you were coming to Chicago as well, so I look forward to seeing you there. Let's see. Once again, 826LA is a fantastic charity that we promote and push for this. They do great work with after-school classes in creative writing for underprivileged teens and children. If you have the opportunity, look into it and see if you can provide any sort of funds to what they do or go ahead and give some time to them. Teach and be part of that wonderful environment. They're amazing. I highly recommend you check them out if you haven't yet.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Taliesin, didn't you say you ran into a Critter who went and started to do D&D?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I did. He's starting to do stuff down there.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I love that. So thank you.

lines.name: TRAVIS, ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's good stuff.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: If he can do it, you can too!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I believe we have some new merch? (excited noises)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And look how cute it looks under overalls.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So cute!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Those are in the store right now! As well as our new CR logo shirt, which nobody is wearing.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh! I need one. I need a large.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. I'll get one for you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Should I get one in the store? Are they available?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: At GeekandSundry.com! The shop! There it is!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I love that color!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It is executive!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, it is. It's like the sophisticated version. Yeah. We have some dice as well as lots of other merch, so check it out.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Let's have cruises soon.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. Let's get our own Sea Org and we'll give out ranks.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No! Nothing like Sea Org, please!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We're just getting over being sick! No cruises!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, anybody have anything else they want to say or shall we dive in?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I like Girl Scout cookies.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And wel-- (laughter)

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I was going to say it, but I thought it was-- I'm out of practice!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: For those who are unaware, Ashley just full-on ripcorded out of halfway-a-phrase and it was beautiful. It was adorable.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It could have been so many things.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'll get better at it again. Give me a minute.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Before this happened, as a part of a journey towards this Tri-Spire, both Caleb and Jester made their way there, Caleb unsuccessfully entering a nicer district of the city that did not seem to believe or respect his presentation. Jester did so. She got a room at one of the hoity-toity inns in the district and was led to some mild disappointments. Where we left off, the two of you had reconvened and begun making your way back to meet up with the rest of your friends at the Leaky Tap tavern. Probably at a brief distance from each other as Caleb has huffed off, in a bit of frustration. Eventually, Caleb, you make your way to the familiar outside of the Leaky Tap. You enter, the fresh mud now a little bit less fresh and dried against your face, into the interior. At this point, it's mid-afternoon, there's maybe about, let's say, nine patrons in there, and a number of your friends who have been waiting for the two of you to return that are all sitting around a table and discussing amongst themselves. The rest of you guys look across and watch Caleb enter, and then a few moments after, Jester enters as well.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, hi.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How'd you do?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Big money?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No. Not so much. Not a lot of money.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Lots of gifts, then?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Jewels?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No. Nothing really. But I saw the Traveler, so that's good news, everyone. He's still around, he's here. He's probably hanging out with us right now.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He's in Zadash? Like, staying here?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes. Well, probably, yes.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Isn't that hard since he's not technically recognized?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Should you be talking about him out in the open like that?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, not a lot of people know who he is yet, so really, no, I don't think I'll get in trouble.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He's a new god?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, I don't know if he's

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He plays lots of local clubs. Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes, basically.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Up and coming. Enjoying a resurgence.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And you're sure he's a god?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah! Yeah, he's really cool. He's so powerful. You guys should really see what he can do, because it's amazing.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Give us a hint.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, he can do lots of magic, and he can appear out of nowhere. That's cool.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That is cool!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Were you with anyone when he showed up?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do you think he'd want to meet us? Or introduce us, maybe?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I can ask him! Yeah!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah. I'm really interested in a god that kicks it with people.

lines.name: TRAVIS, LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I've never heard of that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, Traveler, you heard it yourself! If you like everyone here, you can just show up anytime!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Perception check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: First one! That's an 11.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You look around the room and nothing seems to apparate. The clientele all seem disinterested with your presence. There's nothing that would belie any arrival of an entity she spoke of.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (whispering) I don't think he's here.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, it's possible he's just invisible right now. He does that sometimes.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That is problematic.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Incognito.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I mean, it is not totally unheard of. The legends in history are full of stories of the gods dabbling with mortals. I don't know what happened for you today, but-- it is not common, but it does happen.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, it happens.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: He shows up to you as a man? Or how does that work?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah! You know, he's just this guy. I don't know exactly what he looks like, because he's got this hood.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: A hood?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I imagine that he's really handsome.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think he's really cute. He sounds really cute. He can probably hear me right now. I'm so embarrassed! (laughter)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Hello, guy.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Right? Maybe he'll start talking to you too!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Maybe Molly can do a seance and he'll come out!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, well he might get-- you know what? He might think that's really fun. That could be fun.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't normally speak with the dead on a first date, but we'll think about it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yasha, do you have any kind of communication with your--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I mean, I certainly don't see him in the flesh, so no.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But do you talk to him?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yes, of course.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Does he talk back?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Not exactly.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe you have to get somewhere really quiet, because the first time I heard the Traveler it was super duper quiet.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: That's a good idea, actually. That's a good idea.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Fjord, can I ask you a question?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you remember how long it took us to get from Port Damali to the border into--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I don't recall exactly. Do I recall exactly?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do. From Port Damali to the southern gates of the Empire and the Wuyun Gorge, on foot-- which you guys were traveling on foot-- it took you about the better part of two weeks. You passed through Nicodranas-- or you didn't pass through Nicodranas, but you went through along the road and skirted along the side. You took the road pretty much straight there, but it was quite a bit of travel on foot to get there.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: By a few days, I mean a couple weeks. I think that's more of an appropriate estimation.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So wait. If I sent a message from Alfield, then-- or, wait. Where were we when I sent that message?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You were in Alfield.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Then would it have got to Nicodranas and to Zadash by now?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh yeah, Jester, that's got to take a while to get there and back.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It would take quite a while longer. I think it's too early for you to have checked today.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We were in Alfield because that was also when I stole the mail.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Also, sometimes people steal your mail. You can get robbed on the road.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, I believe it was Trostenwald.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, I just had an itch-- you have a little dirt on your face, but other than that.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Shit happens.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So maybe that's what it is, that's why.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Of course. Now, is she supposed to send you stuff here?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: She was going to send it to The Pillow Trove.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We'll have to hang out until it shows up, then.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It seems like it's harder to get over to the Pillow Trove, maybe you could have them forward your mail to here or something like that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It would be a pretty expensive package, so I feel like-- maybe I could do that.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Or if we had some sort of a P.O. box.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't know what it is, but I'll look into that. I have a room there tonight, you guys.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Room party!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The thing is that apparently it's not easy to get into that district.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I was not able to accompany her to the Pillow Trove.

lines.name: SAM, MARISHA
lines.text: Why not?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Because I am shabby.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You're shabby?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That is fair, you are shabby.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Shabbily dressed.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Shabby chic.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We need to get you some nicer clothes, then.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You know, I was thinking on the walk back here that I would probably like to get a cloak of some kind.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You could also get a new jacket and new pants.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I know where everything is in every pocket of this coat. It has been with me through a lot. What?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe we can go somewhere and they will make a coat exactly like that coat with all the same pockets, only it won't have the holes in it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: How long could it take you to memorize pockets on a coat? That's like 20 minutes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I will probably just get a cloak.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, that's probably good too.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Should we get you a rag as well? Just to have on hand like a hanky. So you don't have to do a full bath, you could just do a quick--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm not bothered. It seems like maybe--

lines.name: SAM, TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm not bothered.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm definitely not bothered.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yasha makes a good point, though. Just in case a simple wipe-down was enough to gain you entry.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You know, water is not very hard to come by, so I can--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Or we just keep going to visit that guy who made you clean. Every day we could go see him, and then he makes us all clean!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You could really just get a new coat.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Does feel like a terrible abuse of hospitality.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What, to use his power like that? I want to ask The Traveler if he knows how to do that, because I wonder if he could make me do that.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is the Traveler the only god you've ever seen, or have you seen other gods, out of curiosity?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, I've only seen that guy.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So this is the one that decided to make itself presentable to you?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Mm-hmm.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: She does see hamster unicorns. Are they gods?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, they're just unicorns.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We've been sitting drinking, right?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I've been drinking.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We've been plotting our next moves.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We've got to tackle this job at some point.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We've got to get to that sewer, you guys!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, it's a sewer nexus with a beast with webs.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So we're not having this room party?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're having the room party after the sewers.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, because we'll have bank and then we can get room service and shit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But we'll have to get clean or else we won't get in there.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I want to defile a very expensive shower.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's what I'm saying, is the sewer first because you are all going to be dirty like me.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And somebody else's hotel room will get us clean.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: If you're renting a room there, maybe they have to let us in.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You also have to get in in order to rent the room.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think they only have to let me in, technically.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Did they give you a hall pass or something?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I have this key. It says Pillow Trove on it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is it just a key or is there a thing that dangles from it, something we could mimic and make more of?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a very intricate key. It feels like a dense iron, but it's been gold leafed, or coated in some sort of reflective gold-like metal. It's very well made. It has little scrawlings on it, almost like a spiral in the center. The key itself--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Jester, can I see it real fast?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: --is probably worth a silver in its own right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh yeah, Beau has it right now.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh. Thank you. I take a real good look at it in case I want to fucking Minor Illusion that shit later.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Good to know.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: They're very strict at the gate for who gets in, and some of us might not have a problem, but more than one of us might.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Caleb, why are you so hung up on just changing clothes for, like, ten minutes, just to get through the door?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It seems more like you are hung up on it than I am.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let a man be eccentric.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm just saying, you want in, dress for what you want.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's why I want to pay for a cloak.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: This is your jam?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm a real fan of this one.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It gets real turnt up when this here starts playing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You turn back at the three-piece half-elven band that are moseying their way through the afternoon lazily. They're whispering and chatting amongst each other and ribbing each other with their elbows between things, half-paying attention to the music, but it's nice enough to keep atmosphere.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm tossing a silver over, just for that.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: A silver?!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fucking start small, man.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Don't tell me how to spend my money.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As the coin clinks and rolls about two feet off, the gentleman standing with this double set of drums that lays over a leather strap on him-- you can see he's got the shaved sides of his head, this young half-elven boy-- immediately sees that, stops drumming, grabs the coin, gives you a nod, and goes right back into the song. You watch as the other performers all of a sudden immediately look to you and they're all like--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Now the beat's all off.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What you're hearing is the happiness of a performer.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Are we going to-- (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Two things; one, Fjord, will you pass me these cookies over here?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Thank you. Second of all, are we going to try to tackle this sewer this evening, or is this something that we're going to do tomorrow?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What time is it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Later afternoon.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I've been looking at some of the folks around here. I think they're over-exaggerating the importance of this beast.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, I think we should at least go down there and take a look.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, I'm not opposed to going down there, I just mean are we waiting until cover of night or are we doing this--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nah. I don't think so. I'm not a super fan of the sewer during the day. I figure I'll like it even less at night.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, why don't we at least go and talk to that guard that came back? Try and track him down, maybe get a little bit of insight.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Ooh, yeah. Do we know where that guy is?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do we know where that guy is?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Which guy?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The guy that came running back.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, or was there a guy that came back?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That Voloshin said that one of them ran back from the task.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you don't know anything. You can go back and try and ask for information on that, but you haven't met him or know anything.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I know one thing that's a photosensitive thing. If we need to make a fast escape I'd rather have some light maybe, if it's something like that.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Daytime's better for that. Different environment.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Good thinking.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So is it better to go now or tomorrow morning?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't know.

lines.name: TRAVIS, TALIESIN
lines.text: Now.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How long does it take to get over to the Tri-Spire area, find us a manhole?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: From where you are now, it'd take you maybe the better part of 45 minutes, better part of an hour.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is it early afternoon or late afternoon?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Late afternoon, you said?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's late afternoon. You're probably about an hour and a half, two hours from sundown.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We'll be fine.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I say we do it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, why not?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I mean, it will be dark after that.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm buzzed, and if I have another drink I'm going to be more than buzzed.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh yeah, let's drink and fight. That's a good idea.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We're definitely going now.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm right where I want to be. I want a 45-minute walk to get there.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Hey, let's do it. You'll walk your buzz off.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Let's maybe stock up on some torches on the way there. Nah, we don't need torches, do we?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Not anymore.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Not with your nerd goggles.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Long-distance perception checks without light, you're still at disadvantage on them. I've been bad about keeping track of that.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You've been bad.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We have a light spell, though, don't we?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's not super bright. Unless I--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I must have a torch or something.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I have one in my adventurer's kit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You have an adventurer's kit?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I have a tinder box.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you can turn things into torches.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I have a hooded lantern.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I have a tinder box too. I have a torch!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) Everyone looks at their equipment suddenly!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This game is amazing!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I have all this stuff in this bag I never opened.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, all righty. What's the plan?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, I have an axe now!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do. You have a handaxe.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You've got a handaxe.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yay!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Have you equipped it?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, look at that. Oh, wow.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How about we casually make our way over, and as we're doing that we can keep an eye out for kingsguard and see if they know of this guy?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Copy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Are you guys making your way towards that direction?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I would like to keep my eye out for a decent clothing shop.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, fair enough. Make an investigation check for you as you guys travel and traverse the city.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That is 11.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So if you want to buy a cloak, you can do that.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I would like to get something that is brown, muted, nothing gaudy. Probably don't have that anyway.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not in this one, no. Your choices are pretty much brown, black, and gray, so you're good.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'll take the brown one. Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're good on that one. I do not recall if they had any pricing put down for cloaks.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's 50 gold.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 600 gold pieces, please. Eh, it falls under what would be general common clothes, so I'll put the cloak cost at two silver.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. I have that.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: A poor man could buy half a cloak. Half a cloak between them.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: One of those shitty dueling shawls that they throw off?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Exactly.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I love it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Actually, what season is it? Are we north? Is it going to get cold?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's cold.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You would know this, too, that snowfall is fairly common throughout the winter here.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can you pick me up earmuffs?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Of course I can do that. I ask for the largest size they have and I get a woolen cap as well.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: For both of those together? One silver piece.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, okay. I have that.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Are you going to take your ears and roll them?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That sounds amazing. I will do that.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Warren T. Rat in American Tail.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Two sponge rollers.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Perfect. Following that, the task board contract that you recovered and was assigned to you by the Herald of the Hall contains both the Writ of Lawmaster Intent, which is what will give you approval to travel into the sewer without being harried by the Crownsguard, and also gives you the location of the sewer that leads you there. Following the basic instructions and asking around, you eventually find yourselves at the corner of Ruen Road and Dewmist.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ruin?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. R-U-E-N. As you approach this intersection, largely still cobblestone, a few that are missing and the dust has sift pockets to make it soft. The sky is still light, but you can see the sun just beginning to crest past the near walls, and familiar to the two of you, you guys are maybe two blocks away from the outer wall of the Tri-Spires.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hey guys, we're about two blocks away from the outer wall. We're super close.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At the intersection, there are two crownsguard that are stationed there that are keeping eyes and watching around. Off to the eastern side of that intersection, behind one of the poles that contain the lanterns that are lit at night, you can see the cover that leads into the sewer below. It's less of a sewer or manhole cover, but there's an open drain, and a latch and a small metal pole that prevents anyone from going into it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Are there any clowns in it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That is a-- why I'm looking it up-- a ten.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You don't see anything dangerous, Georgie."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, Jesus. Please no.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you begin to spend time staring through the grate and start deciding how to get into there, one of the Crownsguard stationed walks up and approaches quickly and goes, "Excuse me, can I "ask you what you're doing here?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, good! They came to us.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Get 'em.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Explain what we're doing.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Heard any rumors? Do you know anything, before we go down there and maybe die?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I've heard a few things. It's a--"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Uh-huh.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Apparently there's something down there that's been real scary and--"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Come on, man.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'm not fucking going down there. You kidding me?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm not-- why--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I only know what I've heard!"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Did I ever ask you to come with us? I just asked for rumors, man.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No, I can open the grate."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Don't put words in my mouth!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I wasn't meaning to put words in--"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Open the-- What did you hear?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He scratches his head over his helmet and doesn't realize he's not getting to the itch.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Stop with the nervous tics. Stop.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All I know is that apparently they lost a couple of guys down there and--"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I know that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "One of them was pissing himself and ran."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's still not information on the monster.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, be my guest." He pulls a key off of a ring and goes down to the latch on the metal bar that blocks off the entry and pulls it open.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What guard was it that ran away?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I don't fucking know! There's a lot of them around here!"

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Do you know how they were killed? Did anybody see any wounds?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "They never recovered the body."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: They never recovered the body.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They're probably eaten completely by now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, you're welcome to go down there and continue."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are all the sewer grates blocked with a lock?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yes, to prevent folks from wandering into them."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no, but how will we get out?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, I'm stationed here for the next several hours, so as long as you return--"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: To this one?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "To this one. You'll be fine."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What if we get trapped at another one and then we can't get out?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, start shouting. Keep that writ on hand and if there's any crownsguard that hear you, "they'll probably be able to let you out."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Seems reasonable enough.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is there a way to navigate the sewer systems? Any markings we should look out for?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'm going to be honest, I haven't been down there. It smells real bad."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do you know if the sewers flooded any time during the day? Any sort of unexpected water flows?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I don't think so. We haven't had any heavy rainfall. I haven't been able to hear more than a "trickle down there for a number of weeks."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Nothing about what kind of monster it is? No darkness? Tentacles? Big teeth?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Any sounds going on in there?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Nothing I've heard, no."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: When people ask you who were those brave souls that ventured into sewer, you tell them The Mighty Nein.

lines.name: SAM, LAURA
lines.text: (whistle and intone theme of The Good, The Bad, and The Ugly)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I understand. There's seven of you."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Count again.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I move to the other side of Nott.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You have to think about it for a while.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He looks genuinely overwhelmed by all the information and goes, "Good luck, and yell if you "need something." (throat clearing) He pulls the rest of the bar open and you guys have this space, about a foot and a half.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Who's first?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I go.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah! Get in there, tank!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yasha, as you climb down, immediately it drops, and your foot finds a rung. There's a metallic bar that acts as a ladder. As you begin to lower yourself down, you can look to your left and right, and what little bit of daylight is coming through helps fill out some of the interior. You can see what looks to be maybe 15 or so feet across, from side to side, 15 to 20 feet from this wall to the other, slick stones, a slight curvature that leads into a base where there is a small ditch or a basin where old liquid is trickling through. There is a mild decline heading away from the direction you are and a mild incline heading in the direction of the Tri-Spires. The smell is not pleasant, but you're a tough chick, it's never been an issue. So you get yourself down, and it's no more than ten feet to climb to the base of this at the moment. You see from this spot where you've climbed down, the ceiling drops low to about ten or so feet. You're probably about 15 or 20 feet below the surface now.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'll take out my torch. I'll light my torch once I get down there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Your torch lights and the bright space begins to open up from side to side.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (yells) Do you see any monsters down there?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I look around. (yells back) Everything looks good!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Spoke too soon.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I forgot how to play D&D! Everything looks good! (screams) Uh-oh!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The boulder from Raiders.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yasha?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Eight! Like I said, everything looks good!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do you want Nott down there? It's what you do. You're very good.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah, come on down, Nott.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Before I go, can I borrow that ring of water walking?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, sure. Wait, which one was it?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Not that one, that one, or that one. I know what those are.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What about this one?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't know if you have to attune to it, but I'm going.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You don't.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you don't have to.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are we going to keep going? Or should we get the--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: We can wait until everybody gets down.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can we come down?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's fine! Just come down.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Coming down.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I keep looking. Keeping watch. Listening.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You all eventually down into the sewer grate and then you hear the (metal scraping) (click) and the metal bar up top is closed.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He locked us in!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, he just closed it, Jester.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's a trap, we're all going to die.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: We won't die.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What do we think? Go up or down? Up, right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think a monster would be down.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Monsters are down.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I do a look around to see if there are any types of street marking for the sewers?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an investigation check.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I put the glove of blasting on my left hand.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Natural 18. 22, I believe. 22.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Looking at right near the base of where the rungs are, it looks like there are arrows that point each direction. The arrow to the right, which leads upward, splits into three additional arrows.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So one, two, three type of a thing. What about the arrow to the left?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's just a continuous arrow.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What the fuck did you just draw?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: This arrow splits into three arrows and then-- and it's a penis.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: If you ever make a road sign, people are fucked. That is--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's a Nintendo controller.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yep. That's some old fucking Street Fighter combo shit.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Up, up, down, down, left, right, left, right.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Right, yeah. Also, there's got to be an A and B around here. All right, I guess there are more options this way or down deeper.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: South.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I mean, it is a sewer system.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You really want to go south? You two?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Always down.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Well, I feel like if you were a monster, you would go--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Go further away from people.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I like that logic.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Or it could just be the main drainage out of the city.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's fair.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Bobby Tarantino territory. Let's do it. Let's go south.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I feel like we're walking in a stinky crotch. Why?!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The Traveler!

lines.name: LIAM, ASHLEY
lines.text: No!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Everything's going to be fine, Jester.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Shh. Don't spoil it! You guys begin to head southward. It's a very faint decline. You can only tell it's a decline in the sense that if you look right or left you can see the water is trickling in the direction you're traveling. The tunnel continues for about 100 feet or so before it curves slightly to the right and then comes to another set of rungs and another sewer-top access.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Were we told that there was some sort of webbing?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, that was the only notable element of what you were looking for.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I see. Any of that as we go?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Perception check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I wrote down blockage, webbing, and nest.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No sense of webbing, no.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do we see any rats down here?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At the moment, you don't see anything moving, no.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Any tracks of any sort?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an investigation check if you want to.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You get down and look about, and you don't see any tracks by any means, but you notice that near where the water is-- and it's a faint trickle of water. The stream is about that wide, and you barely hear it moving past. You see elements of sludge that has slowly congealed over time along the edges of this groove that guides the liquid, and you can see bits are pushed like something had moved through in the direction of where you were, but that's it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: In the direction of where we came from?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Angled like something slid and pushed through the water in the direction you came from.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: How big are those slide marks, Yasha?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: About four inches.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Four inches?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. You see one or two that slide out.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Does that mean we're going the wrong way or the right way?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to get down and take a little bit of the smear and--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ew!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do I taste anything?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an intelligence check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: 19. Plus five! No, plus three.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a combination of things. Your alchemical history and heightened goblin senses for waste product. There's hints of excrement.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Know how much diarrhea blasting they did in the Middle Ages? (groaning)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No! No! No! No. All right. Um--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's old diarrhea.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Stop it, Sam! Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is your fault.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: There are people eating at home right now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nothing that catches your immediate attention except for -- Oh my God, she's no longer roleplaying!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my God! I didn't even put it together.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's all that's in the haversack.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I just want this.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Because you rolled so high, that faint iron aftertaste is familiar.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Familiar?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is it blood?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It reminds you of when you've licked a wound or bit your lip. It's very faint. Because you rolled that high, you're like, hmm.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (groaning)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: How would you know that?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I know this taste. I know it well.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nobody is going to ask you why you know that. Just so we're clear, you don't need to explain anymore.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's sort of like Pringles, where you just can't have one.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I might throw up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So what are you guys doing?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So something's been killed and dragged that way.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I think maybe we should head back in the opposite direction.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: In the area where we're at, the only exit now goes up another rung to the outside?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Part of this network of sewers that have been built below Zadash long ago.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Since you're tasting hemorrhoids in the water, it's probably coming from that direction.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, you're right.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The water seems to be moving towards the direction we're going?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You were heading down, and the water's trickling in that direction.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Go back the other way.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We turn around.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Let's do it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys continue back to where you were and traverse instead upwards. You guys had paid a little bit of attention when you were traveling towards the Tri-Spire, but the entire city is not level. There are grades to it. It was built over hilly terrain, as most of this valley itself has all sorts of varying heights of hills and clusters of hills. The Tri-Spire is up on a raised hill within the city's construct, so as you ascend in the direction of the Tri-Spire, you get the sense that you're not ascending too terribly much, but you're now just about underneath where the wall was. As it curves around a bit, you look ahead as Yasha's holding out her torch, and you can see a T-intersection of the sewer where it continues on straight, or heads to the right, or to the left.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You should probably lick the ground everywhere and see if you taste that blood anymore.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You also see more of those clusters of built-up refuse that have created small masses in the ground where the water is pooling and making its way around.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Blockages.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The curved surface of this area, can we see the ceiling clearly or is it way above us?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can, yeah. And while the floor itself-- the walls gradually come in and become a bit of a level platform and then descend into the ditch where the water is traversing, the ceiling is a continued curvature of it. It's almost like a tube.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Any webbing?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to look for footprints.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You make an investigation check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Perception?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's a one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You see a very faint, barely shifting piece of thin silk cheese cloth-like material that is barely visible on the cusp of the torchlight on the right-hand side of that intersection.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Guys, guys, look, look! Bring the torch over!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Dust?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's a webbing!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As we continue from this point, guys, I want to know what your marching order is as you're traversing forward.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Hey, I'm at the back.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right. We have Caleb at the back.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe that would be bad, though. Maybe you should be in the middle. Have you ever been at a haunted house? They come at you from behind!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'll take the front with Yasha, I'm assuming.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll be right behind them.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll be with you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. Swords in the middle.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nott, you're in the middle with them?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Middle-rear.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Jester, where are you?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I guess I'll be right behind Molly.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There we go. So you go up and inspect the web?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The left-hand tunnel continues for about 40 or 50 feet before it curves off and goes upward again, almost a parallel path. There's water trickling down there that's all meeting here. To the right, where this webbing is, there is no water. It is a dry ditch.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I bet that's where we need to go. It's blocked.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Can I touch a little bit of the webbing with the flame?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure. You bring the torch to the webbing and watch as it burns away in a few seconds and turns to ash and dust. There's also a very faint scratching sound.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm activating one. I'm pulling a hand down one of my swords and I'm getting it to light up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You activate one of them. As it lights up, you bring the torch around to look.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Putting my goggles on.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm going to go ahead and cast Armor of Agathys, get on the spectral frost armor.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As the armor filters up onto you, the weird, warm, humid air of the sewer interior seems to crystallize against your armor. The ice that normally gives a translucent bluish-white color has a strangely yellow-green tint to it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Poop-mist!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's the snowcone variety.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: As I see everybody doing this, I'm going to take a big swig of liquor.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You take a quick swig. You guys look out in the distant tunnels and you see nothing.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Scratching sound's a rat and we're all like (whimper).

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (squeaking)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's funny. As you glance down at the ground, though, one of those small clusters of refuse shifts a little bit. And shifts again.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (whispering) What is it?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I take a ball bearing--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Poke it with your stick!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They've gotten larger as you've progressed on.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to take a ball bearing and ping it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How close is it to us?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's a bunch up in the hall around you right now. As you throw the ball bearing and it hits, some of it breaks away, and you see horrible matted fur. There's a flash in the torchlight where you see two eyes reflect through, and you hear this sound (shriek). You watch as fangs open up, and a bunch of the other clusters of gathered refuse all suddenly begin to shift and skitter in your direction. I need you all to roll initiative.

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: (exclaiming)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We're fighting poop-rats!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's a hairball.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh my god.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's what happens when I roll one that I haven't been charging up.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Look at this sewer! Is that real wet?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It just looks wet.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's like resin.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We had you guys up here.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's actual shit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Matt is very committed.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's reality seeping into our game a little bit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no! See, Caleb, look, you should've been in the middle of us!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All of these sewer-faring giant rats begin to rush towards you. Their fur seems to have, over time, merged with other bits of discarded debris and matter, causing this outer shell of broken garbage, trash, and excrement that protects them and gives this look of a horrible, half-burned pile of compost with teeth and fur rushing in your direction. On that note.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I love that we're fighting rats right now.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I know! It's so Baldur's Gate. I love it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (chanting) Level three!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: For initiative here, guys, let's start with 25 to 20. Anyone?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh shit, really?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh damn.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 20 as well. Natural 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You rolled a natural 20? What's your initiative?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Zero.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, that's right. We have Nott and Fjord. 20 to 15?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm a limited fucking warlock.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (chanting) Level three!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh shit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 10 to five.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Eight.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Six.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: No, I know. I'm one to talk.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, mine was nine!

lines.name: TRAVIS, MARISHA
lines.text: Nine!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Molly, what was yours?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Six.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Vier.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It might've been eight. Let's just make it eight because I can't remember if I rolled a five or a six.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At the top, all of them start rushing in, their eyes glaring as they shift past the torch that Yasha's holding. There's probably six, maybe seven in the vicinity at a quick glance around you, and they're all rushing in your direction. Nott and Fjord, you guys are up first.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I turn to see where all of them are in relation to the party. Are there any sons of bitches over here that I can't see?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At the moment, you don't see any.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay, great. I turn around and I see Caleb being flanked by two of them, and I know he is super squishy. Can I run towards this rat?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I reach back with my hand and--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That rat there gets an attack of opportunity as you swipe out of its range first. That is going to be a 15, actually, not bad.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That hits.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You just got bit by a rat, running away.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As it snaps out at you, you take five points of piercing damage. As it bites out, you feel its teeth sink into the back of your calf muscle, through the armor and into the back of the thick running muscle. The pain strikes through you. You yank your foot away and you feel something tear. You can feel the blood running down the back of your leg and inside your boot as you feel the pounding of the very dirty bite that it's left in the back of your leg.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The rat takes ten points of frost damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Continuing your round.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I reach back to strike the rat. As my hand comes down, I'll summon the falchion into my hand and strike down.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and roll for an attack.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is it also yellow water?

lines.name: MATT, TRAVIS
lines.text: No.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's a 14.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A 14 hits. You can roll damage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Ten points of damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you sweep down, you completely bisect the rat with your blade. It screams out in this loud, heavy, horrible, monstrous squeak. You're not used to hearing what normally is a small rodent sound, but amplified from a larger, bulbous, mutated form that it now has. As you impact, you see it cut in half. It releases this putrid cloud of whatever gases its body holds in it. I need you to make a constitution saving throw, please.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nine, 13.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You manage to hold your breath and back out of it as it dissipates around you. That finishes your turn?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes, it does.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Fjord! Why you got to fart while we're fighting?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I got nervous!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: There's a couple rats within range of my allies, right? So that I could get sneak attack?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct! There's one right there. Each one of these is considered one spot between you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, I'll disengage, back away down that hall that way, get far enough away, then turn around back, go (whimper), and fire my crossbow at the one next to Jester. No, that's Molly.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right there. Okay, go for it. Roll for attack.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: 15 plus four, I think?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits. Go ahead and roll damage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, so. 15.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It rears back and goes to leap in the air towards Molly's face. It gets maybe two inches off the ground before your bolt sinks right through its skull, emerges on the other side, and it spins in the air. The momentum of its leap striking the momentum of your bolt, and there's a spray of blood in the air. This noxious cloud of gas emerges from the wound that's left in the side of its throat. I need Molly, Beau, and Yasha to make constitution saving throws, please.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (groaning)

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh no.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's a small hole the bolt makes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They seem, based on the bacteria and whatever they've been living in, to be carrying a large amount of this gas in their body. What'd you get?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Natural one.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Eight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Molly, you pull away for the moment and put your coat over the front and block it. The two of you, unintentionally, it gets into your nose, it stings your eyes, you both take three points of poison damage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Shit.

lines.name: MARISHA, TRAVIS
lines.text: (gagging)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Finished your turn, Nott?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Beau, you're up. As you're coughing, it's stinging all of your senses, and you right yourself and prepare for your turn.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: One, two, three-- apply damage. I'm going to take this one that is in between, closest to me and Yasha, and I'm going to do a big ol' golf swing with my quarterstaff. Not that dice, you were mean to me. Ooh, that's good! 22 to hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits. Go ahead and roll damage.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh no, that's a four. I thought that was a one for a second. Eight damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Eight damage. Angrily, in response to this, you sweep down with a giant golf swing of your staff, and as it hits, it impacts, bludgeons the side of its body. It gets slammed, hits the wall, and falls to the ground. Some of the gas seeps out of its body, but it isn't exposed. It is dead, but the method of damage delivery seemingly didn't disturb whatever was contained within its body.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Interesting. I still have my other attack, yeah? Can I move in and kick that guy?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Over which one?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Natural 20!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Jesus!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Come on, give me that big ol' four-- That's a one! Six damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It gives this screeching sound as falls over onto its side and then gets back in its place. It's hurting, it's barely holding itself in place, but it's angry and ready to snap back at you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I reach over to Yasha and I go--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And it is Yasha's turn, actually.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah. Wait, is this a dog next to Caleb, what is this?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, those are all rats. I didn't have as many rat minis for this. Use your imagination!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughing) I have reservations about killing a sewer dog.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay, I think--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You get the idea.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I think she's got this, so-- I don't want anything to happen to Caleb. Can I get to any of the ones over by him?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have enough movement to get to any of those.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Let's go to the one closest to him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Over here? One, two, three.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm going to-- Wait, so slashing-- so bludgeoning keeps it from--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: From breaking open.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm going to rear back and punch it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, go for it. Make an attack roll.

lines.name: SAM, MARISHA
lines.text: Punch it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yasha the rat puncher! You're not raging, right? It's just a regular attack.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits. So it takes one point of damage, plus whatever your strength modifier is.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's good.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Don't you have a-- Actually, you've got an unarmed strike.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Unarmed strike, yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I look like I have an unarmed strike too, but I don't think I do.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: One, plus your strength modifier.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So that means you can do four points of damage. Technically, it's not one point, it's four points--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, it's one point, and then she adds her strength modifier to it. So four, yeah. So it takes four points of damage. As you bludgeon it, you hold the sword with one hand-- Or your sword's probably still sheathed at this point, you're holding the torch in one hand, so you rush up and fist-punch it.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Do I get-- I don't because I moved-- do I get a bonus action? (mumbling) Still trying to figure this out.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is the torch in your punching hand?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's not a light weapon, it's not a weapon you can off-hit with it.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Can I just touch it? Set it aflame?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You could've if that was your action, but you've already punched it. However, you did straight up rush up and cold-cock deck a sewer rat in the face. Once again, you feel the crunching right behind it as it falls over and gets back up, its jaw's hanging off to one side, and it has this horrible gurgling sound as it screams at you. A combination of this reddish blood and whatever putrid green liquid is mixing and pouring out of its mouth.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I move my cloak to--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, that ends your turn then, right? All right, it's now their turn. This one is going to shift around, painfully limping to get down and try to bite out towards your legs. This one's going to move, still in combat with you, and go after-- actually no, because you punched it, it's going to continue after you. This one is going to come after you as well, since you rushed up in its way. So the one coming after Beau. That is going to be a 15.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Miss.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Misses. You duck out of the way. The two against you is a 16?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Mm-hmm.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Mm-hmm.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, and a 17. Both hit. So you take, from that first one, six points of piercing damage as it leaps up and actually--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I have resistance to piercing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're not raging.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh, you have to be raging?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's okay.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay, got it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can use a bonus action on your turn to rage if you want to.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Got it, okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's okay. So you take six points of piercing damage. As it bites up and you put your arm in the way and it clamps onto your forearm, it begins tearing. You shove it off and it lands onto the ground, spins, and gets back to its feet. The other one, you take four points of piercing damage. As you shove that one off, the other one leaps onto your back and begins snapping at the back of your neck and shoulders, and you shove it back onto the ground, and it readies itself for another strike as they're slowly swarming around you. Ending their turn now, Jester, you're up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. I'm going to run up to the one that just attacked Yasha. Yeah, and I'm going to hit it with my handaxe because I'm not very smart.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it. This is the one that's already been punched too, so you rush up with your handaxe and swing. Go and make an attack roll.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You could flip it blade-up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That definitely hits. That's 21.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, that hits. Go and roll damage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's a seven.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Seven points of damage. The rat that's face is already broken, even when it managed to bite towards Yasha earlier, it was mostly dragging its top fangs across the side of her forearm as its jaw would not actually snap shut. You finish the blow by taking the axe, swiping down. As you do, you carve into its body and a cloud of poison dissipates from its torso area. I need Yasha, Caleb, and you, Jester, to make constitution saving throws, please.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Aw, you see it was like, (strains) no, fuck you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You manage to hold yourself off, not being taken into it a second time.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Eight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Five points of poison damage to you as you accidentally inhale a spray of it into your face, you're like (gasping).

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's in my mouth!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Five? You also take five points of poison damage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That shit doesn't work.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, it doesn't help.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That end your turn, Jester?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think so.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so you finish coughing.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wait! Yeah, I don't want to use that just yet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, then Molly, you're up.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I see the mess this is making, and I'm going to turn around and I'm holding the sword, but I'm going to punch with the hilt of my sword.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it. Which one are you going up to, the one that Beau kicked earlier?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, the one that attacked Yasha.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, go for it. Roll a d20 and add your strength bonus.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's a 12 to hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 12 just hits.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's one damage!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You deal one point of damage to that one. As you reach down and sock it in the head--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I can take a bonus attack though, and I'm going to hit it again.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, are you attacking with your--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, I'm using my other hand, since technically I have two attacks, it's not two--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have two attacks with the light weapon on the side, technically. Eh, I'll allow it. It's fine, go for it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's another point of damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so it takes two points of damage. So now you guys are rat punching. You guys are going through and punching the fuck out of rats.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Punching the fuck out of rats.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Repeatedly decking the face--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fuck you, you dirty rat.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's not really enough to damage you, but as you're punching down, you're hitting slick oiled fur and jagged points of broken wood and whatever else has jammed itself into its matted fur. But you've managed to hit it a couple of times and it's taken a little bit of damage, but it's still like (snarls). It looks very cornered and lashing out now. That ends your turn, Molly. Caleb, you're up.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I would like to start backing up towards, in this direction, towards Nott, away.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh no. I would use a Caleb bonus action to dry heave and then I will use my action to cast Fire Bolt towards the rat by Yasha.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: By Yasha, go for it. Roll for the attack.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ja

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 13 hits. Go and roll damage on the Fire Bolt. It's a d10, right?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ja

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nott and Fjord.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are there more rats?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There is one more over here that's limping next to Beau.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Where's our order?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right. Nott will go forward next to Caleb and peer around, and fire another crossbow.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh no, I got it! God!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I know! I haven't been in any gas, I don't know what's going on. All I can see is you guys going (yelling) like weirdos. So I'll fire.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Aw, too helpful. You're being

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 18 hits. Roll damage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: There's sneak attack damage too, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's a lot. In the teens.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: How do you want to do this?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I guess I will--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Ray! (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Way to date yourself right there.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: If there's a way to pin the rat to the wall, I'll do that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. As you turn around the side of Caleb, putting your second bolt in, spinning around, firing, it strikes the side of it, and where you hit it in the side, there's this large pocket of stretched rat skin where it's pulled so far that the fur itself is disparate and you can see the peach flesh beneath the fur. As it hits, it (explosion). It's a combination of force from both the blow of the bolt and the propulsion of the release of gas that sprays right in the direction of Beau. I need you to make another constitution saving throw, please.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Save. You got it, smash it. You're rolling the bad dice again.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It rolled a natural one again! Laura, put it in jail.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's okay, you only take one point of poison damage, I rolled really low for that one.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's really pretty though, what a pretty die.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (whimpering) I know.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You take one point of poison damage.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Everyone's catching their disease here.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no, Matt! Wait, how do we know where we're going, though? How will we choose?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'll leave this here as a visual aid, sure.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You worked to make it so nice.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is the direction you guys had come in from, so the liquid is traveling down this way, and then down this way, and there is no liquid from the side, and the web that you had destroyed is up in this corner.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, we go that way.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're going to go in this direction?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no, how hurt is everyone?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You gotta look in the camera.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I did.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh good, yeah.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I mean, I'm 19 out of 32.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Right? I should do a Cure Wounds on you.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'll take it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. I cast Cure Wounds on Yasha!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What were you down to?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's above your whole--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, that's my max.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: That's your max?!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah. I'm sitting at 14.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Well, it's good I took the hits, you know?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, that's your job.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's why I said it. Eight points.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: In comparison to some of the scents you've encountered in this conflict, suddenly the rest of the sewer doesn't smell as bad.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yup. Nostrils are burned right the fuck out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh. How hurt are you, Beau?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm all right. I'm only down five hit points.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, okay. Let me know, you guys, because I've got lots of healing! Because I'm the cleric.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Seriously, Caleb, how are you?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: If we hit you really hard, would you still be standing up right now?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: If who hits me very hard?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's a good question, I hadn't really thought about that.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: If she hits me very hard, I'm probably okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I would never hit you!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I know, that's just-- you know, it's just a--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I care for you, Caleb.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You have a monster on your chest.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Are you very scared?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Generally, are you asking me?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Just right now?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Right now? No, because I am with all of you, and those were just mice.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I am extremely scared right now, but I think that we killed the monster and we can go back to surface now, right?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I don't think that that was the monster.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That was clearly something down here that's been killing people.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think something's making those things like that.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The rats are not making webbing. There's something else.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh god, what if it's a giant spider?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's probably a giant spider.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And it's infecting the rats. (whispering) And they're turning into poisoned--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Spiders don't like rats, do they?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Rat spiders! Ooh!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I don't understand why those rats were--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Poison balloons?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: (chuckling) Yes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Did you see the one that kind of looked like a dog, though? That was freaky.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: At first, I thought it was some sort of evil gassy dog.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, I would theorize that perhaps their diet is 20% food and 80% diarrhea, so it's not very surprising that they explode into fecal matter.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I bend down and, covering with my vest a little bit, see if I can search and figure out exactly what these things are made out of?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The interior of it appears to be rat or animal-like. General array of organs, though a lot of them have a colorless gray or beige appearance to them, and a lot of them look to be in various stages of necrosis, and there's a lot of infection inside.

lines.name: TRAVIS, LAURA
lines.text: (groaning)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, it's pretty nasty.

lines.name: MARISHA
