lines.text: Guys, I think these are undead rats.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think they're full of pus!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Are they undead rats?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can go ahead and make an intelligence check.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: With advantage?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With advantage.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right. Where's my intelligence-- there we are. That's a-- no, that's a nine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nine.

lines.name: TALIESIN, TRAVIS, LAURA, ASHLEY
lines.text: Nein!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You could just say nine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: These things are--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Mostly undead?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Or at least, they were alive up until a moment ago. These infections, when they continued for a period of time, probably not for long.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Zombie rats?!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Just really infected rats.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, they had pinkeye in all their parts.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: This is only the appetizer, maybe we should try to find the main course.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We should keep going. Should we be more sneaky, or should we just walk?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah, maybe we should be sneaky.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, I think stealth would be a good idea.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's be sneaky.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: To the right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: To the right, okay. You do get a glance with your torchlight, Yasha, as you glance up the path across the way, and the path that curves around the side, and you do see a few other similar collections. Though not moving, or not reacting to the vicinity of where you are. Even glancing at the ones who were fighting you, you can see upon closer look that their eyes are snowblind, or infected to the point where they were very nearsighted, or close to blind. The patches in the distance you can see aren't reacting you your presence.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We could set them on fire from a distance.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Or just don't disturb them.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, but what if they all spring up. We could just set them on fire.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are we going that way?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, you're going that way.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're going a different way.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay then, let them live, and die in horrible pain.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) I'd like you to all roll stealth checks, please.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Stealth checks! Can you help someone there, Jester?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh yeah, here you go!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Not me, I don't need it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Who is the most noisy of us all? Which one of you fuckers needs some help?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I rolled shit for stealth, so it wouldn't do me any good.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well here, take an advantage.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'll let it happen. Usually you have to give that before they roll so you don't know.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Just kidding.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Should I take up the rear?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You're coming back after a break.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's fine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 15 is better.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hold on, I have to check--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ten. Not so good.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Eight. Not so good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You see ahead of you a majority of the tunnel is currently blocked, other than a small path on the right side of it, by a dense webbing of some kind.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Let's set it on fire!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You see a large knot, or a-- not a Nott, a knot of webbing as well, that is held aloft a foot off the ground.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's the egg sack.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Or a body.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Or it could be somebody that's being slowly sucked dry of all their blood.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You're totally right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Should we set it on fire, or should we see if it's living?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think we should try to cut it down in case it's a person.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is it wiggling at all?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 15? It does not appear to be moving.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think it's dead.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You think its dead?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Or it's sedated.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: What if we (blows air)?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Should we go try to cut it down? Without alerting them.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You normally touch a spider's web, they come running.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's true.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Have I ever read anything about the science of larger insectoid creatures?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Possibly insectoids. This would not be, technically, an insect.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, but it's not familiar to me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I mean, it's webbing. There are many creatures in nature that use webbing in different forms and types.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Like YouTubers.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, there's that too. Glancing at this, the mass that is encased in the webbing is about this big.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's a dog.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's about dog-sized.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Or a rat.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Is it close enough to us?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's about 20 feet ahead of you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can we see a past that into any further clumps of webbing?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check with disadvantage, because it does go beyond the torch threshold.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It doesn't appear to be human-sized.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That one does not, no.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That one does not.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Looking past, you can see layers of webbing continue for about, what you can see, 20 feet beyond that. It looks to be an even heavier wall of it behind that completely blocks continued access into that chamber. You can see two other much larger clusters of webbing that are wrapped around something.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Are we able to get to this lump?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can get to it, yeah.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Or do we have to go through some of the web?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You see that it does shift every now and then. It looks like there's some sort of a breeze coming through, faint as it is. That's why, from the webbing that is currently held aloft between the ceiling and the floor and the left wall, from your perspective, the first one you see, every now and then you see it faintly shift, as if a breeze or water moves through.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do we have to break any of the planes of webbing to get to this cluster?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: To get to this one? No.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Let's cut it down.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Maybe we can look at it up closer?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to try to very gently, maybe, with everyone's permission I'm going to gently start cutting into the bottom of it, not too deeply.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait! Should we get ready for some sort of distraction or to do something to the other web first?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm sorry, do you have a plan?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, no, I just--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, all right then. I keep moving downward.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, is this the one with your activated rite?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And the rite you activated was?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It was the radiant rite.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The Rite of the Dawn. As his scimitar, which is now glowing with this faint radiant light energy, it almost burns through as you carve through. Slowly, it's not an easy cut, but you do carve through. As you do, the webbing begins to curl back and blacken at the edges. As it pulls away, you see something furry and fleshy. As you pull it back a few more inches, you watch as a rat head, lolls out, a tongue falling out the side. It looks to be dry, it looks to be bereft of any sort of internal liquid or life.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's good to know. That means the human-sized ones are probably fucked up too.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah, that's probably true.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Or they haven't been eaten yet.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How long ago did they say the guards went down and didn't come back?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Quite a while, but I'll remind you that our mission is not to retrieve any guards. It's to kill this beast.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: If we kill the beasts that are down here, then it might be worthwhile to also check the bodies of the guards, you know, because they're not going back to the to their families, you following me?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That was dark and angry.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Steal from the dead bodies?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, they're not going to use it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I agree. Yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll work with that.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Shall we move forward to the first plane of webbing that would hinder our movement?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Just a suggestion, we don't have to do this, I'm not even sure how I feel about it, but I have just learned how to create a somewhat spectral servant to me, one that is unseen. I could send it in to poke about and if anything is going to happen, it could happen to it first, instead of us.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I like that idea.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Does it interact with the environment?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, it could poke at things and you know.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Would it move the webbing as it went through?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What do we like more? Poking the webbing, or sending it up in flame?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I agree with Fjord. I think we we start poking around, that thing's going to come running.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Might as well--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But then we'll get to see it, and get the drop on it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: If you burn its web it will do the same thing.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah. What if we back up and burn it?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: My way of thinking is what if that web is sticky as

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's why I said; why don't we back up and burn it?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I think that's actually a very good idea.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's try and not set fire to the human shaped things.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah. What if they're still alive?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, Caleb, how about you send your spectral servant to poke at the little masses of human and see if they start wiggling?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. Also, I will say that, you were worried about burning their dead bodies. But if we burn the dead bodies they might burn, we're not going to help them, but if any coin have, or any items that are magical in nature will be fine. So it's okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, yeah, that's good.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: The thing is, if we kill them, I mean, we're putting them out of their misery. You know.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They'll probably end up as giant pus sacks if they survive.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah, they're probably already--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Or maybe they

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, that's possible. This thing that I can do, this servant that I can make, It's not going to be able to open these things. It's very weak.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I said poke it. Then if they wiggle, then we know that they're alive.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's true.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How about a poke and then a flame?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Poke and wiggle. Then a flame.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I think if they start moving, this thing's going to--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, it knows that they're alive---

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: But then we'll get eyes on it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So I'm sure they wiggle every now and then anyway.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That way Nott doesn't have bad dreams that we burn some people that are still alive and then we can set it all on fire.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, no, that was Caleb who was freaked out by fire.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, right.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do it, Caleb!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I pull a stick out of my coat, and I hold it between thumb and pinky like this, and there's a string wrapped around it, and I take my fingers, and I pull along the string, which begins to glow a faint gold glow, and a being, same height, and about same skinny-ass proportions as myself appears before me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, it does not appear.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It doesn't appear? You tell me, because you're the dungeon master.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's unseen, but you sense its presence arrive.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's unseen.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh, that's what that means.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: On the dry, dust-covered floor of this interior part of the sewer, where the temperature has dropped and is a little less humid in this area, there are two small plumes of dust on the ground and you sense the servant has arrived.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I go up and I push it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, you put your hand forward and it's like hitting the back of someone's back, but there's nothing there and it catches you off guard, you're like "What the heck?" It feels somewhat amorphous, like a heavy wind pushback for a second, but there's no wind and there's no whipping of force around your arm. It's very strange.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think your unseen servant farted on me.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well the rats have already started. So Schmidt, I want you to go to these larger bundles and give them a little pokey-poo.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You sense this-- the first webbing barricade which has a small five-foot space between it and the wall, to the next one, the one that you saw, which encompasses the entirety of this wall. There are small one-foot wide sections of it along the upper part of the wall where there's a gap, but most of it is pure web across. There are two of them there and are you getting close with the torch to reveal it? Otherwise it's going to be beyond the torch light, it's going to be very dim and hard to see the details.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah, I'll follow as far back as I can.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I have to stay within 60 feet of Schmidt.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right, so the two of you approach the first barrier to see the second. As Schmidt approaches the second barrier, one of the masses, which does appear to be humanoid in size, shakes slightly, doesn't react. The other one shakes slightly, and you watch as an arm limply falls from the side of it, some webbing tearing, as it does you hear a metal sword clang to the ground. You see a bracer that once belonged to a crownsguard.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (whispers) Schmidt, bring me the bracer.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The bracer (whoosh) and drifts on its own in your direction.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I wonder if the giant spider thing heard that.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, probably.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What did you say? I did not understand your accent.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (loudly) I said I wonder if the giant--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Shh!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She wonders if the giant spider heard it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, we all wonder that.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: So they're dead, huh?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, not moving.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Burn that shit then the spider will come and we will burn that shit too!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: How close am I to one of the human form ones?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're about ten feet from it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: They look pretty dead, don't they?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They look pretty dead, they're ten to 15 feet from you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Firestarter!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I mean this is the firestarter over here.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Let's burn it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I can do it from a distance, yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Should we get into some sort of position so we're not all clumped together?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, do you have any specific order you want to maintain here?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How about four on one side and three on the other of the tunnel?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That'll do.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Caleb, do you want to stand behind me and little peeksies from behind?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I would like to stand behind everybody.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll take the front of the other side of Yasha, since I've got some armor.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'll stand behind Fjord.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I guess I'll go with team Caleb/Yasha.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Wow. Fucking betrayal. Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, Caleb, Yasha and Beau--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm trying to split up evenly!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Is it Molly and Fjord at the front of the other group?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll go behind Caleb.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so Nott goes behind Caleb and then we have Fjord and Molly on the other side with Jester behind them.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yep. Little bit of magic on both sides, little bit of tank.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You move around that barrier and get to the next ten to 15 feet up where there is the next larger barrier of webbing and the two unmoving humanoid forms wrapped up there.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I can do this from 120 feet away, once every six seconds I'm going to use Fire Bolt. I would go (whoosh whoosh) and hit them both.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. They both impact and the bodies shift, there's a burst of flame. Some of the webbing ignites and burns and curls away, but it looks like the flame is so instantaneous it's not enough to immediately ignite the webbing. There is a burnt mark on them and neither of the forms move or react to the impact and the web shifts and shakes for a moment before it eventually comes to rest again.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Just as a test, to the one on the right I do it again.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, you do it a second time. It burns a little more, as the webbing burns away in that section you can see the crownsguard armor chestplate that is now a little bit charred beneath the impact.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, well, he's dead. Should I just keep chipping away?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You still have your torch, yeah?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah. I'll help. Are we moving forward or we're still--?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're all still in the back, but you can move forward if you want to move forward.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, this is every six seconds so I could just stand here for a minute going (whoosh whoosh whoosh) and not get close.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Hey Nott, will you do me a favor and make sure nothing sneaks up behind us?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: There's things behind us, too?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Could be.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So I guess I'll take the next 30 or 40 seconds, if that's what it takes. I'll focus on one and just keep burning it away.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to go 15 feet behind us.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check so you can watch. With disadvantage because, unfortunately, you're away from the torch light to do so.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's a one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The webbing burns away, it's not enough to catch the bodies on fire, though it does singe and burn the exterior and as you look they're both in various states of decay. The skin you can see, as you approach a little bit, Yasha, to take a look, the cheeks within their helmeted heads are sunken and sallow. The lips are curled back over the teeth. They are drained of any internal life force or blood.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Can I poke around with the tip of my sword and see if there's any money or something in their pockets?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an investigation check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (singing) We are the worst. We are the worst.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He's not using it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They both look like they were caught in a state where they'd be willing to travel anywhere and spend money.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'll take them.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, you being to pull from their bodies, what are the rest of you guys doing?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We could take their weapons, I bet they're nice weapons. Or we could return them to the Crownsguard, maybe they would reward us?

lines.name: TALIESIN, MARISHA
lines.text: Do they have a dog tag?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Glancing about as you inspect the bodies, there's no identifying tag to them. There isn't an elaborate system of maintaining Crownsguard members or identifying that you've noticed at least.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I search for puncture marks? Stab wounds? Bite marks?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a medicine check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I take their helmets and put them in my pink bag?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure, easy enough to do.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What about their weapons? Do they have any?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're well kept, not used. You look along the blade and there are barely any signs of indentation.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Does it say anywhere "Property of the Crownsguard?"

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, but they are uniform design. They're not elaborate or ornamental. The Crownsguard weaponry are all pretty much designed or provided by a similar blacksmithy technique so they all feel like they're uniform to a certain degree.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Ten on the medicine check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's enough. It's not too hard to see. As you look over each of the two bodies, both of them have heavy puncture marks, either right in the back of the neck on one of them, or the other one has it right under the front of the chin. The puncture marks are about that wide, about two inches across on each side where the skin and flesh has bubbled and pushed away from the side and they go very deep in.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You know (clicking). Yeah. So watch your shit.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Caleb stands still for a second and looks around. Do I hear anything?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, in my sleeve. Oh, that's a one. So I don't hear anything.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How's the ground that we're standing on now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There would have been some general webbing towards the base of this, but you've burned away that central area. As you step forward, you look beyond where that burning mark is and there is a stark left turn. It curves to the left and looking around the side it curves again to the right, maybe 20 feet beyond that and you see another webbing barrier where there looks to be three different figures. You see now there is another figure that is not part of the webbing barrier but is just webbed to the wall right next to it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: But the stone is unim--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Unimpeded to the point it would be an issue.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Not tacky.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, you feel a little bit of stickiness when you step around from general fallen bits of stray webbing strands and such, but nothing that would impede your movement.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How is it to try to chop through it with the axe?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can go try to either the one behind you or the one ahead.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, I want to try doing it and see if it sticks to the weapon or if it cuts through.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: To the one ahead?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You come forth to the web there in front of you to where the two other figures that are massed there. They are both humanoid and you now look over at a close glance as a third one, small, looks to be another one of the rat creatures that is caught in there. You carve through. Go ahead and make an attack roll. Roll damage for the handaxe.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Seven.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Seven, okay. You carve through and a large part tears through before your handaxe stops and you're like (grunts) can't push any more. You try and pull back and as you do, you pull your arm back and it gets ripped from your grasp and it's now stuck and folded, and your handaxe is now wobbling in the web.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to very gently cut her handaxe out with my radiant sword.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You begin to carve around it and pull it out, and you eventually get it free but now there's a cluster of webbing around it almost like the world's worst cotton candy. It's wrapped around the center of it, but it's sticky.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The worst kind of candy.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Don't eat it!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Jester, put it on the ground and take ten steps back away from it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (metal plink)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (metal plinks) The metal hits the ground and makes a bit of a sound.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Except it's covered in webbing so not as much sound.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, but the metal still hits the ground.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (whoosh)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's that wedge opening where you've cut in that webbing barrier and behind it you can see the entire floor of the next portion appears to have some sort of webbing layer around it and all the walls are covered in it. Across the way you can see rungs and the end of this portion of the drainage that leads up into where you can see the wind would be coming through, and that faint bit of wind that's pushing through that's causing all the webs to shift is coming from what you can barely make out to be the faint bits of sunset light peeking through another exit. A sewage exit just like the one that you came in. You also see a number of other figures that are all webbed to the walls and encased within there.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All of the ones webbed to the walls are just as emaciated and dead?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I get my handaxe back?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can, yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Thanks, Caleb.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Six.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You glance past in the distance. It's too hard to see, unfortunately, because the torchlight is too far away.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: How close are we to those now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, you're at the second web wall. That's about 25, 30 feet from you so it's beyond the torchlight of where you're standing.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's a dead end past all of this? It's a dead end and just goes up?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It looks like it. It goes to a dead end, but it's all covered in webbing.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's got to be around here somewhere, right?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Or it's behind us and waiting until we get in its room.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's not behind us!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to start trying to cut down, find the points of the web wall where it's being held together and cut any of the web.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Nothing back here!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Because of your rite, you manage to carve through and you watch as the second web wall comes and folds to the end. The bodies that are encased in it hitting the ground with heavy thuds. You can see the other bodies that are webbed to the walls around. On the inside, you can see the end of this. It is a giant web nest.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: If we deem it safe, maybe someone could look out this other exit because, probably, something is down here with us, but mayhaps above the grate, this thing lives in a house perhaps. I don't know, I'm spitballing.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Or if we go up to the grate, and try and get someone to open the hatch in case we need to beat a speedy retreat.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That is also good. That is two reasons to do it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Should I go up?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, do it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Give her the writ of law thing.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is it blocked in and webby all along the ground?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you walk past, the ground itself is sticky. You can still move, but you're hindered somewhat having to like pull through and it tugs at your feet. You guys watch as webbing tears and builds on the bottom of her boots as she walks in.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I stop walking.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You stop and look and you can see the faint outline of bodies that are webbed to the wall. Parts of the faces that are revealed that are gray and lifeless, drained. On the far wall, you see a large cluster of webbing. It looks like a mass of three or four bodies jammed together and you see one body that's right next to where the rungs are that is not as webbed as the others, and there is color to the skin. You see elements of a humanoid face. A halfling, it looks to be. About halfling sized. It is about a foot up off the ground, webbed to the wall, one arm is drifting out and part of the face and unconscious, but is not gray and dead like the others. And that's where we're going to take a break.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, no! But that's a person!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I know. We'll come back on that. It's because I want to make sure we all get to the bathroom, including myself. I have to pee like a fucking racehorse. So yeah. We'll pick up on the reveal of this non-dead body.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't like it either.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: You went to no's like, "No no no."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I apologize.

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: I apologize.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We're fans of Deadwood, if you couldn't tell. Right now, the offer is only for residents of the United States and Canada, excluding Quebec, because of laws. We're trying to figure out how to expand that, but that's where we are at the moment, so I apologize if you're not a part of that. I'm so sorry. We have no way to get around it, but we're working on it. For the official rules, you can follow the link in chat. It should be available to you. Tonight's prize is the Purple Heart Adventurer's Arsenal, which you may recognize as the wood that Scanlan had in the last campaign. In case you haven't seen what these arsenals are, it's a dice box as well as a great interior. You can keep your dice, your pen, minis or erasers, anything else you want to keep in there. They're pretty badass. So we have that. The contest has officially started, so all you have to do is go into Twitch chat. Tonight's code is sewers. The plural. Sewers.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is there an A in that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You had carved through one wall and caused that to fall off to the side, and leading to the very end of it, you saw an ascension that went to another exit grate into the city. A number of bodies, one large webbed mass of a few bodies and one individual that looked to be still alive, though unconscious and webbed against the wall.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is he reachable?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: From you right now, he's about 20 feet ahead of you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (whispered) He's still 20 feet away from me. You guys! Hey fuckers!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What?!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm a little worried about walking any further because my feet are starting to stick to the ground, like a lot. But there's a halfling stuck to the wall over here and I don't think he's dead.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. You stay there with the halfling. I might be able to negotiate my way a little further.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is Jester right up with the halfling?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, I'm 20 feet away from it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: If you had to ballpark the distance to the halfling or to the very end of it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: From you guys all together, it's about 25 feet, 30 feet. Jester is a little bit closer.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All clear in the back!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'd forgotten.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I am going to join Nott at the back and keep an eye on the rear.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No need!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, jeez Louise.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Ten.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You see nothing in the darkness behind you. Who else is doing what?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I am going to walk up to Jester and stand next to her and then I am going to send Schmidt forward to this halfling to try to maybe lift up his, its, I can't tell you. The chin of this halfling.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to also move forward next to Caleb.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You move forward next to Caleb as well. You guys are finding your feet sticking to the material of the floor webbing. You approach. You watch as the head of this halfling is pulled away from some of the webbing and lifted up. It is male. Actually, because you're still with Yasha in the back, make a perception check both of you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well if I can't see--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's low light beyond that so make a perception check with disadvantage.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I've got dope goggles, though.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, well okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can make a straight perception check if you'd like.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well I would say if I can't see, if I knew I can't see, if I were really in this place instead of sitting as this table.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can if Yasha comes closer, but Yasha has the only source of light.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: If I couldn't see coming up, I would go (poofing) and send out Dancing Lights.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Natural 20.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: There you go.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The Dancing Lights appear in the air and begin to drift in help fill out the area, your torch light still being this larger beacon of flame light in the space. Beau, you glance ahead and can see as the chin is lifted, a thick band of tattoos--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's real cool. He's got a thick band of tattoos, sorry.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A thick band of tattoos that completely encompasses the neck to the point where what's exposed from beneath it's like black shapes and designs completely around.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Of the halfling?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Of the halfling, yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do they look old or like a fresher tattoo?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Did you roll a natural 20?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I did roll a natural 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Your amazing monk-like sight, they're not fresh.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: They're not fresh.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're not fresh.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do I see puncture wounds?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do not.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Giant dripping fangs and beady red eyes, a row of them glaring right at you as this (hiss) pincers open up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How close is it to you guys?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's right behind Fjord and Nott and it is striking you, Fjord, as its first strike.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It snuck up on us?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Wait, so it's behind?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's literally here!

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Oh!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Was it on the ceiling the whole time?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is going to be a 23 to hit.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Against my 14? Yeah!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: While this death is happening, Caleb is Schmidt go like this to the halfling. Caleb's going, "Hey guy, hey hey hey."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Halfling!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You suffer seven points of piercing damage, as its fangs snap right into your chest area. Do you still have ice armor on?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The armor is gone.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I also need you to make a constitution saving throw.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Shit! 17.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You feel venom pulse into your body. Your physicality, however, being somewhat sturdy, manages to resist a large element of the poison that is suddenly thrust into your torso. You take-- that's a terrible roll. You take five points of poison damage. Nott, you look up and see this thing as it digs its giant pincers and fangs into Fjord's body and it pulls back and you watch it vanish and disappear.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fuck!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I need you all to roll initiative.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's an invisible spider!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: To be fair, invisible spiders are the best spiders because you can't-- hey, look at that!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, look at the webs!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Why are we invisible? Oh.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We're not invisible, those are dead people! I see dead people.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Invisible shit ass bitch! Nipples on a horse!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The last place you saw this--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Are they invisible, the people that are on the walls?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The last place you saw it was there before it disappeared.

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Fuck!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Where before it disappeared?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wait, why are all the other things invisible? Does that mean those are other things that are going to attack us?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nice!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh goddamn it, he has it this whole time.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, Jester's up front at 22. 20 to 15, guys.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I have 15, as well. Nobody has higher than a 15?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I had a 22.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, I mean besides Jester.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty, that was ten to 15? Ten to five.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm sorry. Then ten to 15. I'm 13.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You're both 13?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Beau and Molly. All righty, and ten to five?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Eight! Oh, seven, I'm sorry.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Five!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Good, separated from everybody.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Man, you always have the shittiest initiative!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: So do I.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, why do you guys always have bad initiative?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Because we save it for when it really counts!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's true.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Weird.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The top of this round. Jester, you're up first.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm up first! Okay, did I hear it happen to Fjord? Did I hear anything?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No. Well, you hear like the reaction of pain, and you glance over just in time to see this large, monstrous spider body vanish in place.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm probably screaming.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nott is just--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (screaming)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I cast Spiritual Weapon, a giant purple lollipop! Oh no. I've got some, but you have one too, don't you?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We have a couple around.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, do you have one there?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, you have the one. Don't you have the one?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You have a one with the stand.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That Brittany made?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, but it appears to have been moved since they used the table last time. Oh well.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Somebody took a picture of it then disappeared it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It might have happened, yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I make a giant teal lollipop instead! Here you go.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Where shall we place this?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Directly overhead of where the spider disappeared.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, we'll put it there. It worries me that I get to unveil that and it's not around.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Does anyone know where the lollipop is?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's fine. Jester, you use that as your bonus action to cast. What are you using your action for?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to, oh god, cast Sacred Flame on the place that it was at. Can I do that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sacred Flame is a cantrip?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can, sure.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: On the place that I saw it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It has no target to effect.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's not invisible guys, it's gone.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nothing happens?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, there's no burst of flame. The spell has no target.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to back up against-- oh no, if I back against a wall, it's sticky, isn't it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The space, all this area here, where the webbing starts is considered rough terrain to move through. So your speed is halved moving through that area.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to take a couple steps, if I can, like up on those rocks next to Yasha is it? Yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We should probably clump together.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So you back up onto the rocks and start pulling your feet out of the webbing as you do. That ends your turn?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ending Jester's turn. Caleb and Fjord, you guys are up.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Can I get either inside or behind that crate that's in the corner with difficult terrain?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I can say you can start to get into it. It doesn't offer you any cover at the moment, but you're in it right now.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, for an action, I am going to cast the Blur spell on myself again

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He doesn't seem to be.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well then I will summon him to stand above me on the box.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: CALEB
lines.text: So I'm blurry and there's an invisible guy right above me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ending Caleb's turn. You are currently blurring and shifting.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay, can I spin back after getting fucking bit by a goddamn spider, and can I back up-- 10, 15, 20. Does that cause anything to hit me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nope.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Cool. I don't see nothing, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Currently, no.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nice. Can I fire Eldritch Blast in the direction that I saw it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a main attack roll.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's not there.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It moved! (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You get the sense that it's not apparently there.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I need to see it to do anything else. All right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That ends your turn. That brings us to-- all right. So--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The spider is in between Fjord and Beau.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The spider is in between Fjord and Beau. I thought Travis would make the note, but he's not.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He's busy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There is a moment, Fjord, as you back up after releasing your Eldritch Blast where it impacts the wall and you're like, "Shit." You hear this (whoosh) sound and look your right and it appears right next to you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Where?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh fuck!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Well, he's not invisible anymore.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It lunges out towards you again.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, I mean, you don't need me to tell you it hits.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is eight points of piercing damage, and I need you to make a constitution saving throw.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Damn!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: How many?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, that's an eight.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's a lot of dice.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, you take 15 points of poison damage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's all of the poison damage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm unconscious. No! Relentl-- The thing, I got the thing! It's called Relentless Endurance! I come back to one hit point!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's Relentless!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Sorry, I'm half dead.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You feel your lungs and heart seize for a moment and you almost fall back. That burning orcish rage from underneath gives you that last bit of inspiration to shrug off the poison and look back angrily and realize you are in deep shit.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh fuck.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: There you go, Freemasons. He's actually a half orc.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty, that ends its turn. That brings us to Beau and Molly.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do you want to go first?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You can go first.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is there a way I can hop over the web situation?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Is it bothering you?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's been bothering you this whole time?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It was bothering me this whole time, too! I meant to fix it in the break.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Laura Bailey, the kind of friend that tells you when you have a booger in your nose. I really appreciate it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I jump this gap where Molly is and avoid the webbing?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can certainly try. Go ahead and make an athletics check. You are standing in webbing, so it's being able to--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Natural 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I will say yes! I will give you the ability to leap through and land off to this side using your movement and avoid that ten feet and still manage to free yourself from the webbing. So that was 15 feet of your movement used to leap.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So I have 25 more feet?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: How close can I get to the spider?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Let's give it a shot.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I mean, Beau is pretty fucking amazing in combat.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 25! You're not quite close enough.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fuck! I don't have any reach with my stick.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, you have whatever monk abilities that you have. You have eyes on it at the moment, yes.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I will hold. I will take a dodge action.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You start defending yourself, preparing for its onslaught. That brings me to Molly's turn.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to head towards the spider, as close as I can get. There's not a lot I can do.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're right there.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to use Devil's Tongue, I'm going to use Vicious Mockery.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It rolls a natural 19 on its saving throw.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (guttural Infernal sounds)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's like three 19s in a row that it has rolled, by the way.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You have something in your throat, Molly.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What dice are you using?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, the last two I was using the Golden Snitch. This one I used the black d20.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We are all going to die because of the Golden Snitch.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It was gifted to me at the end of the last campaign.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It was gifted.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Or did you throw it on the table and Matt snatched it up?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We are golden gods.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I have made a terrible mistake.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So, Molly, you moved up there and you're still ten feet away from this creature.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm just going to hold.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so you're holding--?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: An attack for the second that it's within range.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so you're holding your action in case it shows up within range to strike it. Okay, good to know. That finishes their turn. Yasha, you're up.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay, can I get to it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What's your speed?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: 30 feet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 30 feet? (counting) Just in range!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay, so I would like to rage, and then--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It spins around after Molly screamed at it, and it goes (snarling). You can see in your torch light, as you're clutching it in your hand as you rush towards it. You're going to have to drop that torch to grab your two-handed weapon.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You drop it on the ground, and as it hits the ground, the light flickers off of its eight red beady eyes. It turns, its fangs open towards you and you see the venom and bits of Fjord blood dripping off of the end of it as you rush towards it. All right, you rage, what are you doing?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Rage, take out my sword and try to hit it between the eyes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it, roll for attack.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 23 hits! Roll damage.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: What do I roll?!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's d12 for your greatsword. Plus whatever your strength--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: 2d6 plus three.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 2d6, plus three, plus whatever your rage damage bonus is, which I think is two, right?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: (grunting)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's like an airplane.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, this is the second fight.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It might auto if you select your--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, she didn't get a session zero.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, it's plus two. It's plus five damage to whatever you roll.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Plus five to whatever I roll?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay, 14.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 14 points of slashing damage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: As you rush towards it with a large arc, slamming down like (whoosh), you carve through part of its carapace, two of the eyes are cloven through and are now bloodied and ruined.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's blinded!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It shrieks back. It's hurt, but it's still doing fine. Is that the end of your turn?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah, because I can't do anything else, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay, I stand there at the ready with the point.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Got it. Nott, you're up.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. I'm going to shout out: I think this is the monster! I will nervously fire my hand crossbow at the beast, hoping not to hit any of my friends. 12 plus something? Six. 18.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits. Roll damage. You get sneak attack.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (cheering)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As it opens its mouth, the firelight from the torch flickering in, its horrible weirdly shaped spider-like mutated mouth open up where the pincers and the giant fangs are. A bolt sinks into its throat, and it starts shrieking, backing up defensively, the pain causing it to pull away from you. That's a serious amount of damage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah. I scramble away in Caleb's direction, and that cocoon guy there. I'm going to hide right behind him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Make a stealth check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. A 15.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Jester, you're up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay can I come around the corner and get out of this nastiness? Ooh, it really did stick to it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It really did stick to it. Five, ten, 15, there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I see everything?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, you see right where everyone is and where this creature is.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay I'm going to send my spiritual weapon down there to bash it over the head!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It cannot quite get into range.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How did Yasha get all the way there and my thing didn't get there?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Because yours can only move 20 feet.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's so stupid. Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I believe that's the case.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, it's only 20. Then I'm going to use Cure Wounds. Is it touch?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Cure Wounds is touch, I believe.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Motherfucker!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Healing Word, maybe.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah but it's like dog shit. Aw, look at that.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Does it sparkle? It's got all sparkly little--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Isn't it so pretty?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There it is.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Healing Word is such dog shit, as far as what it can do.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Healing Word? No, it's not!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Psh, sure whatever. I guess I'll do Healing Word to cure you. But you're going to go down again, it's not enough to heal you--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm going to take a healing potion.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, you are?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do your thing.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Or do damage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to-- I'm sorry, you guys. I'm going to Sacred Flame it, then.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. What's the--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 1d8 radiant.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll damage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Aw, two.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Two points radiant damage. Hey, it all helps. A burst of radiant flame suddenly encompasses the front part of its body, between the impact of the bolt, the slashing from Yasha, and the blast, it looks like it's starting to feel a moment of fight or flight. That end your turn?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, it does.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Caleb, Fjord, you're up.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, I can see a straight line from the spider to me so I think--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It does have partial cover, though, because of the angle you're at.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, okay, all right. I'm going to use my movement to crawl out of the box so I can get a better bead on it hopefully. I'll go as far forward and to the side as I can to get a better angle.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (counting) That'll improve your sight there.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, so I am going to steady my arm against the other arm and point at it, and blacken my hand and send a Fire Bolt at it. Here it goes, we'll see if it hits probably not. No, I don't think it does. That is a 11.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That unfortunately does not hit. As it's reacting from the impacts, it begins to rear back, and as it does there's this one flash of light. It seems like it notices its presence and gets really low and flat suddenly. Its whole body, which is massive, shrinks low to the sewer as it passes overhead. It pops back up, ready.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Then before the end of my turn I'm going to (snapping) and Schmidt silently comes up as close as he can get next to me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That ends your turn?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ja

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty. It's now the spider's turn.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's my turn.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's right, I forgot.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: With my bonus action, can I cast Hexblade's Curse on the spider?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, you may.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You should just kill it! Kill it! It's already nervous, kill it and don't worry about healing yourself.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: He's looking rough.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Destroy it, Fjord!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: With the fucking glove of blasting, that we took off the thing, can I go (grunting) and fire all three of the Scorching Ray balls at the spider?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You may. Make your three attacks with disadvantage because it's a ranged attack in immediate face-to-face range.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's a nine, plus two for 11.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 11 misses. The first one goes wide, second strike.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's a one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Goes wide again.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 16 does hit. Your first time using the glove, you're not too sure how the aiming works and the first two go off to the side, you're like "Shit! Shit!" (boom) The third one finally impacts. Roll damage for that.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Aw man that's that Fjord edge right there.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's right. Eight points of damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Eight points of fire damage. Plus, does your Hexblade's Curse do anything on that? Don't you add your--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Plus two to hit, that's it. No, damage two, proficiency. Thank you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's ten, right?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Ten, thank you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (explosion) The second the Scorching Ray blast hits it as it's rearing upright now, and as it lights up you can see the streaks of blue designs across its pale white body. The flames impact and burn around the side, it pulls back ready, angrily back towards you. That ends your turn?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What happened to the healing coming?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It didn't happen.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He's a liar. He's a lying liar.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You just got to kill the spider and I'll be fine.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Fair.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's trying to decide what is the biggest threat right now. I'm going to roll for it, between Yasha and Fjord.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Schmidt, it's Schmidt.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's going to go for Yasha.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, thank god.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Blood Maledict. I see it look at her and I immediately full Blood Maledict. I'm going to do the fucked up one and I'm going to take four points of damage for it. There you go. I have that moment, I look at it, and my neck bursts and I bleed out the vein.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That gives it disadvantage. Which you are very lucky it is because that was a natural 20. That still comes to 16. Does that hit?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: That hits.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You take, from the fangs as it lurches towards you, oof, that's going to be 11 points of piercing damage.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Halved.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You take five points of piercing damage, and I need you to make a constitution saving throw, please.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You've got this.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Natural 20.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Woo, crit on that shit!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As it lurches forward and slams its fangs in the collar bone area, you having no real armor to protect it, you take it head on. The fangs sink and you feel the venom pulse through your torso, through your arms. The burning pains goes through and you flex it off. As you do so, thankfully reducing what would have been-- you only take 11 points of poison damage.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yasha is a heavy metal album. That's pretty dope.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It now sees you all moving around it, and it looks like it's been hurting. You watch as its form vanishes.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: 11 in addition to the--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. You watch as it vanishes from the space. That's where you last saw it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wow.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ending its turn, Beau and Molly, you're up.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We killed it!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Did it bamf?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Bamfed.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. Where's it going to go, I'm going to--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's form up, stick close.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to split the difference and go here.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Don't get so far that we can't get to you if it hits you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm not, I'm going there, because I still want to be able to get to it. I'm going to hold a Flurry of-- Can I hold a ki point action? Or can I hold an attack? Or can I hold an attack and then decide I want it to be a flurry of blows?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You cannot make a bonus action attack on a held action so you cannot unfortunately make a Flurry of Blows, I don't believe, as a held action.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I take the bonus attack now, to do the ki point and hold it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, unfortunately.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. This is balls, y'all.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah. Spider's an asshole.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'll hold until I see it to make an attack.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so you're holding your action until it appears into range. Good to know. Molly.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm sticking with everybody, and let me take one-- where am I? Let me take like a step back and hold my action there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You step back and stumble over one of the crownsguard bodies that you left on the ground, but you hold yourself there, using it as one foot, slightly elevated platform being at the ready. You're holding your attack action?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Mm-hmm.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That ends Molly's go. Yasha, you're up.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh, shit. Okay, it's gone, so we don't know where it is?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It appears to have vanished.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: We don't see it. Okay. I feel like we should get closer. I'm going to move over to Fjord.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: To there?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah, back against the wall.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I know.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: (mimics the music)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: On Yasha's move.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (electric guitar sounds)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (bass guitar sounds)

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I think that's-- oh, can I do Healing Hands on myself?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can, yeah.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay, I'll do Healing Hands on myself.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As Yasha backs up against the wall, greatsword in one hand, you watch as she puts her arm to her chest. There's a faint glow of very faint whitish energy and her wounds heal up slightly.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What the fuck?!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You didn't have that, did you? You couldn't do that type of shit.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, she's path of the zealot.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Well, I think it's because I'm--

lines.name: TALIESIN, ASHLEY
lines.text: Stuff.

lines.name: MARISHA, TALIESIN
lines.text: Because reasons?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That finishes your turn, Yasha?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What's that called, what did you use?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Healing Hands.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's called Princes of the Universe.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is someone going to heal Fjord?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes, I'm going to on my turn.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: As a bonus action, I'll cast Mage Hand and start digging around some rocks, see if there's anything over there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, Mage Hand is an action to cast, so you can't hold--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Not anymore.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, no, with your legerdemain, right?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Legerdemain?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't know.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We're all still figuring it out.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You can use the bonus action granted by your cunning action to

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, it means once it's already out, you can do that to use a bonus action. But you have to get it out.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Got it. Then nevermind.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you're holding your action there?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm holding my attack.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Good to know. Top of the round. Jester, you're up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. How far away are they? I'm going to move forward. Can I get all the way to Fjord? I'm afraid to get too far away from Caleb.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (counting) You can get up to him.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You don't need to heal me.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to heal you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: If it dies, I gain seven hit points.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, good. You'll gain seven more than I can heal you, because I'm going to cast Cure Wounds on him!

lines.name: SAM, TALIESIN
lines.text: Yay!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yay. Six points.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Thanks, Jester. I owe you one.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You don't owe me shit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Anything else you want to do? Move your spiritual weapon or anything?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to move my spiritual weapon in the middle, closer to Beau.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so there?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We're not considered poisoned if we got bit, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No. That ends your go, Jester. Caleb and Fjord, you're up.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Because sightlines are a problem here, I would like to move to dead center where Jester just was, actually, so I have a clear sight on the chamber behind me and ahead of me.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah. I can see everywhere, more or less, in here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, you can.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I pull the diamond out from my coat and get ready, and I hold. As soon as I see the spider, I'm going to release Chromatic Orb.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Good to know. That ends your turn, Caleb. Fjord, what are you doing?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (counting) I turn here and I will hold my attack.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. In case he comes into range.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Good to know. Okay. End of your turn? Last you saw it there. You watch as there's a faint ripple in the air. You just finishing healing Fjord, as he runs past, you turn and smile and turn back just in time to see it, not far from where it vanished, appear right there.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Damn it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (screams)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is a natural one.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (sigh of relief)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wow!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's okay. It will use its movement to move down, and go up the wall here.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It died! Yay, we killed it!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If we went by those rules, you guys would've been dead a long time ago. All right, so you do get an attack of opportunity on it as you swing past. Go ahead and make your strike.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With your somewhat web-covered--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, we got all of it off, remember?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Slightly warm. Toasted.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 17 hits. By the way, those of you that were in range to attack with that held action would've been just Caleb and Nott. Both of you guys get attack--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's about 90 feet.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I don't get a ranged?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You were holding your attack, you said.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. Do I have to say ranged spell attack?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's either I'm holding an attack or I'm holding a spell.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Sorry. I've learned.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Now you know.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Seven damage!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Seven damage, nice.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I prepped acid on this thing and I missed bad. I got a total of nine, so that did not hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A total of

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah. No, just nine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So (fwoosh), and as you throw your orb, it skitters up the wall. You almost hit it, but it pulls out of the way before it shatters, the orb splattering acid across the stonework, burning through whatever outer layer of thick liquid has congealed there.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: From where I'm hidden to where it was when it appeared, how far is that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: From where it appeared? That would've been 40 feet from you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So I have to roll with disadvantage?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, you do.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ooh, not as good. 11.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Goes wide, no impact, unfortunately. That ends the spider's turn. Beau, Molly, you're up.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Ugh. Can I close the gap? With my 40 foot movement?

lines.name: MATT, MARISHA
lines.text: (counting)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's above you on the wall.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Throw your throwing stars!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Like I'm trying to get spiders out of the corner ceiling with a broomstick! Exactly.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'll tell you what. I'll give you the attack, you'll have disadvantage, and if you miss, you're prone. But I'll give you the attack if you want to.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Ooh. I like the risk.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Worth the risk. That's exciting.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's impossible.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There is a path that helps with that, but not this thing.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Of course I do! I'm going to do the full-- I'm like, wasp, get the wasp!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, you leap up to get your single attack on it with your bo. Go for it. Roll at a disadvantage.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Disadvantage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You got it!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I got it! I did! I rolled a 15 and a 17!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's pretty slick.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So that's 21!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits! Roll damage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Don't move, don't move!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Better call an exterminator!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Raid!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 11 points of damage. As you leap and smack it in the face, it pulls up a little bit further away, screeching at the impact. It's looking pretty rough. It's still around, but that was not a positive hit for it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do I have room to still get one more swat? Probably not.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I gave you the one. You're technically just out of range.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That was part of the risk. That end your turn?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, I guess so.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Molly?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to at least run up to the other side of Jester, just to keep us clumped a little bit. What I can do is I can do Vicious Mockery again. I'm going to cast Vicious Mockery and (Infernal voice) I'll cut off your legs! Give it a shot. Make a roll against wisdom.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He can say anything with that voice and it would sound awful.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (Infernal voice) Who ate all the Cracklin' Oat Bran?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (Infernal voice) Can I have a fishing rod? (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Save versus wisdom?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, your spell DC would be eight plus your proficiency, which is ten. Plus your wisdom modifier, which is what?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Wisdom modifier is three.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Three. Yeah, that hits! Roll damage.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Come on. Mock him.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I mock him and that's three points of psychic damage, and he has-- really? Does it not even matter? Then he has disadvantage on the next attack.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you mock the spider to death.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Something about my words are just making his blood boil.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you screech out this phrase in Infernal--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (Infernal voice) I whisper and then I fire.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It falls, slamming on the ground next to Beau, and its legs begin to curl in. As it's shaking, you see blood pouring from wounds that weren't there before. It seems the Infernal itself has affected him physically from the inside. It begins to curl its legs in deeper and deeper, the sound of its guttural shrieking getting softer and softer--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I turn around and go, don't worry guys, I got it. Good ol' broomstick trick. Works every time.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Put him in a mocking bag, Molly!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I never had it do that before.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I regain seven hit points.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There you go.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, don't take it away. I'm going to lick it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It didn't hit anything. It's not even covered with any guts.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's true.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I go up and I give Molly a slap on the ass.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You see what I mean? These people are fun!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: It's good. That was fun.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to go poke it with a sword.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to go back to the halfling guy that's kind of alive.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll come with you then.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm going to kill the half-- no.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So it is a large body. The actual thorax of it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to start binding it up for travel.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Easy enough to do. It's legs are intact, and they're sturdy enough. You bring out whatever robe you have available, and you start binding it and getting it in a position where it could probably be either on her staff or whatever else you have and carry over shoulders. You guys approach the halfling: still unconscious, the arm draped out from the webbing.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Does he look injured at all?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's very dark still, also.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It is very dark, and there's still this torch left in the center there where Yasha dropped it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh shit. Can I have grabbed that as I walk over to him?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure! You grab the torch and you bring it over. You get a close look. There's the web mass in the corner. There's the other bodies on the side, The halfling looks to be injured in the sense that it looks like they took a blow to the head. There's a slight bit of blood trickle along the hairline.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I put my hand on his head and cast Cure Wounds?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Go ahead and roll for the hit points regained there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Now. 11.

lines.name: LIAM
