lines.text: Actually, since I see that Jester has this covered, I'm going to start burning out the dead people and rooting through their pockets and stuff.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Just in case he's--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's a moment after you finish casting it where the halfling shakes the head. "What's going on?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Blessed child. You are alive. Your saviors have come.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What's going on?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You're safe now!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Oh god! (panicked breathing)." He starts looking around, looking up at the faint bit of light now, which it's now just passing sunset. You see a little bit of purple light coming through, and through the little bits of webbing, you can see the grate that leads outside. He goes, "I don't know how I got here."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You don't know how you got down here? You didn't come to the sewer on your own?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well I-- Yeah, I guess."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What were you doing down here?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, I was just trying to get somewhere quickly."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Insight check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an insight check. You see flames bursting at the side. Every time, he flinches.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Whisper?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Whispers.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Far Cry 5!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Far Cry 5? I've heard about it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It takes place in the United States of America.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh man. Full of lessons for America today.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's right. I even heard you could check it out. Ubisoft's Far Cry 5.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'm sorry, I'm just-- oh god," and he looks over and sees the other bodies on the wall and the webbing. He's just, "(panicked screams) Help me! Please help me!"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No need to scream. We're getting you out, don't worry.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm only burning the dead ones! (fire billowing)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (muffled screams)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to say in Halfling to the man: it's okay, just calm down. Everything's going to be fine. I start cutting him out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. He nods. "Thank you," back to you in Halfling. He's beginning to cut him free. What did you say?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Tapping into my background a little bit, I'm going to go: You know, I used to utilize the sewers back in the day. Real good to stay out of sight. Move stuff quickly.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yeah, well it's important when you're an ale hand. You got to move product through the sewers quickly."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What are you moving?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Ale."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you have a key to the grates?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Not a key, but I-- I have a key."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can you give us the key?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You have to cut me free first."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Before we do that, what's your name, friend?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Thed."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Ted?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Thed."

lines.name: SAM, MARISHA, LAURA
lines.text: Thed.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I thought he said "dead".

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Thed is dead, baby.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Thed, where is the key? Which pocket is it in?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'll be happy to show you once you cut me free."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I can start digging. I start digging through his pockets.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an investigation check. At a closer look, too, you can see he's got short, spiky, dark hair and a little bit of a goatee that's trimmed to a point at the end of the chin. The tattoos all across the neck look like they're swirled, serpentine shapes that all fold and knot together, all across the throat, from front to back, like a giant dark band.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's a tattoo, you said?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a tattoo, yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Would I recognize that iconography or have heard of that? Does that mean anything?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an intelligence check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, nope. That's a big nope. That's a natural one.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to cut him out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you don't. Okay. You cut him free, he's like (heavy breathing).

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I rolled an 11 checking through his pockets.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do find he's wearing some nice, black/gray leather armor. He has a pretty nasty-looking shortsword. It's been altered to be jagged at the edge of the blade. He has a small leather case that's tucked in the armor. Don't find a key.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Jagged at the tip.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Jester. What's in that leather case?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do you have the stuff? Or did you--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's free now, as you cut him free, and he's like (labored breaths). He stands up and he rights himself, and checks everything and he looks to the left and goes, "Um?" He points to the mass in the corner, and you see the mass that's there. It's not a series of bodies. It looks like it's a slowly pulsing sac of some kind.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no, eggs. Oh no!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: One of them (bursting) (skittering).

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Molly? Can you?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Kill it with fire! I Sacred Flame it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With a torch throwing and landing, and the Sacred Flame igniting it, you watch as this cluster begins to burn as these tiny white and blue spiders begin to expand out the side. Some of them make it up the sides of the wall.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Even baby-sized, they're about that big. They're all coming up and they begin to burn.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Got to kill them all!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You go and start burning. It appears you've got them all. Some of them seem to have burned, some of them seem to have vanished. It's hard to tell.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, I hear the commotion and come halfway over and nothing seems-- they're burning spiders.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Caleb is blithely burning over here and has no idea what's going on behind him.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You are checking the bodies for things, right?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Of course I am. I'm waiting for the DM to fill in the blanks.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well that's fine, then.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If you go to the other bodies, you get two sets of Crownsguard armor, and two longswords of the Crownsguard.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: How much money was in the first two purses?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, the pouches that you took?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right, the total between those two was 15 gold, 60 silver, and 20 copper.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Just keeping all that for yourself, then, Yasha?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's five bodies. I don't know if I got them all, but are there any coin purses as well?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do, and you go through. It'll take you a little while to go through all the bodies here, so we'll get to see how many you get through here.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did you say two sets of armor? Would that fit in the bag?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hmm?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Would that fit in the bag? Two sets of armor?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, I believe it would because it is a volume/space thing. It'll take up a lot of space within the-- and you have two two-foot by two-foot spaces on the two sides, and then you have the main eight-foot cube section there, so.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, we'll bring these back to the Crownsguard and hopefully get some reward.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do find another pair of studded leather armor that has like a sea motif to it. There's shells pressed into it, and a wave pattern on the edges. The person it's attached to has a bunch of tattoos across their body as well, that insinuate a lot of time at sea, different names of different ships that are different points of faded on the body. They may have been a sailor at some point in their life and has expired under here.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, I will quietly gather that up and put it into my bag.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Well, the armor's a full set, so it'll--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Am I able to carry that? I don't even know.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, I mean, it's a leather chest plate, leather arm bands and bracers, and then leg plates as well, so it's a full set. You could probably fit all that into your bag if it's the only thing that's in your bag.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You stuff it all in there. Beyond that, going through them, for the sake of brevity here, you find an additional 85 gold pieces, 210 silver, and 45 copper.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: 85-- what was it?

lines.name: SAM, TRAVIS
lines.text: Gold.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah. 85 gold.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 210 silver and 45 copper.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is everybody a greedy fuck in this game and we just keep whatever?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I am not telling you that I found that at all.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Cool.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He dies first.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We see him collecting everything, anyway.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, while you guys are all talking to this guy, Caleb is going from body to body, putting everything in his pockets. He's not being sneaky.

lines.name: CALEB
lines.text: Yeah, but you're not standing like right over, looking down. You see me feeling at the bodies.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, but we're all of the same breed; we get what you're doing.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You know I'm looking, but you don't know what I found.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We know you're going to lie about it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Sorry, because everyone is so lovely, can you tell me--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Gold pieces. 210 silver, and 45 copper.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Vex never lied about the loot we found.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I don't give a fuck what Vex did.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Never once. Never once, for all the shit she got for being greedy, she never once lied about the loot.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: She was a good person.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes, but she was a horrible person.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: It's true.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: She's a terrible half-elf.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: She's not here.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm sensing a lingering sibling rivalry.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I know. It's carried over.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hanging over the table.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm clearly Lawful Good. Clearly.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What's Thed doing?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, he's checked all his things, and he goes, "Okay, I thank you all so much for your help. I really appreciate it. You've saved my life."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to do that lean up against the wall thing over the top of him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, as he's doing this, he smiles. You can see he's missing two teeth to the side and he has a septum piercing up in his nose that he rights and pulls back down again so it's visible and he's like, "(sniff) All right."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You real thankful?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yeah."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Real grateful? You feel like we did you a good service today?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'd happily pay you, but your friend already took all my money."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I didn't take anything from you!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I just want one--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I didn't take anything from his pockets.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's what he's saying.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (gasp)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I just want something in return. You know, you provide a service, get something in return, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "What-- if I can be of service, I'd be happy to."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Who's the Gentleman?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ooh.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I don't know what you're talking about."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, friend.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I heard "Gentleman." I'm walking over.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh friend, I don't need to roll an insight check to know that's bullshit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I apologize, I don't-- I apologize. I don't know what you're talking about."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Wait, was was it?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Who's the Gentleman.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to get closer to Thed and say in Thieves' Cant--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You can trust us. We're one of you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a persuasion check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (cheering)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, fuck! He glances down at you, looks taken aback, and returns to you in Thieves' Cant and says, "And the rest of your compatriots?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: They're cool.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Switching back to Common, he goes, "Look. I cannot tell you anything, except for, if you want to find him, there is a place you can inquire. If I give you any more information and that gets around, I am deader than that spider would have left me."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All right. Where do I inquire?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He sighs for a second. "There's a dive, naught but five blocks from here, called The Evening Nip."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The Evening Nip.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We've heard that before!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, it's in the letter!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Don't say his name. Just walk up to the old man behind the counter and mention you'd like a drink, and while you have no coin, you'd be willing to offer many gifts."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'd like a drink--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I have no coin, willing to offer many gifts.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No coin.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "'Many gifts' is the important part. Now, I hope that's been of service, and I-- as you seem to be the types who see it fit to save a person that you haven't met in the bottom of a terrible sewer, I would hope that you would be kind enough to know that that information did not come from me, and that you've never seen me before in your entire life."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What's your name?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: His name was Thed.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Of course, friend, we've never seen you before in our entire life.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "As I haven't seen you, either."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I didn't take anything from your pockets. I really didn't.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Does anything about his tattoo irritate me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's not

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You know what I mean.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. No.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You really do have like a key to the grates, like an extra one?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I mean-- " He looks up behind him and says, "I've got mine, but I need it for my work."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's fair.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Pretty sure we can call for someone with our--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He glances over towards Nott and says, "Unless I'm mistaken, it appears you have a female friend here who could probably help you get around that anyway."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I could try.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Anyway. I bid you all

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Watch out for poo rats!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (distant yell) "I'm aware!"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How many of these victims were other than crownsguard? Any civilians or women, children?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No children. One of them appears to be a woman in her 40s or so. A lot of them appear to be dressed in heavy leathers. They may have been either coming through to try to clear up parts of the sewer; some of them look very poor, and may have come down here in hopes of scavenging whatever had fallen down into the sewer and collected over time. Some of them appear to be similarly dressed as Thed, or at least have a somewhat skulking-type demeanor about their wares.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Anybody have any neck tattoos that look like serpents?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No. There are a handful that look like they probably have traveled this route before and got caught up in it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, what did you find on the bodies? Sorry.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No-- are-- go ahead.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. What did we find?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: There was a bunch of weapons and armor.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nice.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And some coin.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Anything unique? Any unique things?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Why don't we get into some daylight and take a look?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We should reconnoiter to look at what we have.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Anything else interesting in the room, outside of the bodies?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Outside of the bodies? It looks like there is broken bits of what would have been furniture or a cart at some time that got discarded or shoved down here from above. Other than that, just the general refuse you've come across down here in the sewer.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We do have a spider body to pick.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I happen to see-- am I able to see the guy with all the tattoos of ships and stuff?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you see him.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, cool. Do I recognize any of the names of ships, or any imagery?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an investigation check on that.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Ugh. 11.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Looking about them, and what you can rummage through, he's pretty much naked other than his underoos. Looking through, there's like the Midnight Lorry, you don't recognize that name at all; there's one of them that's the Shell Carrier, don't recognize that one. There's one name that catches your attention; it was called the Pink Giver, and it came through your ports at one point. You remember it coming into port, you were paid to take care of it, offload things, back on-- The name itself was derived by a wooden carving at the front bow of the ship that was of a mermaid with her arms extended that was gifting a human heart that was painted with this vibrant pink color that was its signifying visual. Yeah. Other than that, nothing particular about it, just that you were like, "Oh yes, I know that ship."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Is the Broken Howl on there?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Aww.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's on the back.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Throwback!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (sings) Continuity. Roll for continuity.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Beau turns to Nott. Hey girl.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That little code you were talking.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (clicks tongue)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: See any of that written around these walls, or something that looks similar to it?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I can look around. Thieves' Cant is a written or spoken thing?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Both.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's almost universally spoken, and as a language it's used for extended ciphers. Make an investigation check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I help him out, see if I spot anything? Give him an assisted roll?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can, if you want to assist him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have advantage on it because she's helping you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Glancing about, you can see behind the rungs, there's about a two-inch gap across the wall. There is a very, very faint scratch into it that says, although not referring directly to yours, it says "Money pot."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Money pot?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (whispers) Money pot? (louder) It says, "Money pot!"

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Which catches you off-guard, because you're like, "That's one of our--"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's one of our one-shots!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What, what?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's one of our things, but that's not-- it can't-- it's not us. We weren't down here before, were we?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I wonder if this grate leads up into the Tri-Spires, then. Maybe it means lots of rich people are up here.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Maybe. Maybe this is the name-- maybe they've named all the entrances and exits or something like that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe. Easy pickings.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Maybe they buried something here.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: If they don't allow the criminals in, then they'd be real easy to pickpocket, because no one would expect it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: One way to find out.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Should we try to jimmy this lock and get out?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, we can probably call up. We have the writ.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. Well, do we need to get the spider first?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, it's all tied up. Me and Yasha can probably--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: We got it, yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'll put a little bundle on my staff as well.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Jester, will you come look at my eyes? They feel a little bloodshot, I'm not feeling well after my encounter with the rats.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Sure. I put my hands on either side of his face. Can I see anything weird?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Wait, come over here.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm walking over with this, too.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Come over here. I walk away from the group.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I don't know if she follows me or not.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I do, I do.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: There was gold in there. I would like you to have it. It's more than I had before. Here is 100 gold were on those people, so you take it because I know that you need money.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Caleb, I don't--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I know that you need money, and I'm very, you know, look at this. And I do a little joke.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Those are really, really strong.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's sad and funny at the same time. You carry the gold, because I can't carry it all.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, but I'm not keeping it just for me, you know.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's fine.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's for both of us.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, that's why you wanted money, I assume, from your mother, was to help us out in the position we're in.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Of course.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, so you take this, you're a better, you know, I'm always thinking about things, and I'm not very good with amounts and money. So you carry it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Caleb. Thank you. And I'm sorry.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You know, I just had a really bad day today, that's all it was. I guess I'm sorry as well.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you need curing, though? Because your eyes do look bloodshot.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, that was, I'm fine. I'm going to stare at the wall because I don't know how to deal with attention very well.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: While this is happening, what are you guys doing?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm waiting for them to break up, and I suppose we're packing the spider up to bring topside.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm taking at least one button off of every single person in the--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Easy enough to do. You have quite a collection going.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm just waiting.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys have reconvened, you've gathered your things, the spider has been-- all the legs have been pulled up and wrapped and you have either Beau's staff or something else to lift it with on both sides, because it's pretty heavy, it's going to take two of you to carry.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right, we'll carry it.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It would have to be you two, it's pretty strong. The two of you lift it.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Are we the strongest?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my gosh, yes.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh! (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So where are you guys going?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Because you have a big lollipop to carry.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We've got to go up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Up these things, into the money pot.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So. Who's going first?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nott?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, somebody that can talk to the guards.

lines.name: TRAVIS, TALIESIN
lines.text: Nott.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (shouting) Hello? We're stuck down here, and we want to come up. Let us out of the sewers. Let us up!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you climb up, Nott, and look through, the sun has set, and the night has gone purple to dark, navy blue as night has taken it. You glance up through and you're looking out into a dark alleyway. You see two sides of an alley, shaded and dark. About maybe 25 feet ahead, it opens up into a fine cobblestone road. You can see fine buildings across the way, you see the lanterns are light in the center of the town. You have not been to this part of the town, but it's pretty well kept, and no one seems to be immediately around to hear you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is it locked?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It is locked.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can you pick the lock?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and make a lock picking check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What is that, sleight of hand?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, it's your thieves' tools, so your proficiency bonus plus your dex bonus.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Dex bonus is four, proficiency is three, plus 12 is--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, two, isn't it?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, I think it's just two right now.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, it's just two? Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It'd be six.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 18. It takes a moment, and you have to reach around the other side and it opens up, and the bars push open. The gap here, into the back of this alleyway, is about two feet tall. Each of you can get out comfortably. That spider is going to need some squeezing.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We'll give it a push.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We can move it up first.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You manage to push it through. It damages the body, parts of it break and slide off, it's not designed to fill through that space, but it's still mostly intact.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm imagining the Play-doh fun factories.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not quite that bad, but it definitely doesn't look as pretty on the other side.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Face to face, as awkwardly close as I can get.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I am definitely not looking you in the eye.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, you're not. Hey, Caleb. I'm fine if you skim something off the top, that's fair, but be clever about it. Just distribute 60 or 70 percent of what you find, okay? Good boy. Give him a little slap on the face, and then I go up.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Nothing from me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you all eventually gather up at the top, street side. It's completely dark, the night sky is above you, you can see the warm lantern light across the various street intersections, and along the path in front of the various buildings. You definitely recognize this, Jester. This is indeed the Tri-Spires district.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hey you guys, this is where my hotel is.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh. Well, wasn't the plan to have a, what did you call it?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (shouting) Room party!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What time of the day is it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It is night, it is freshly night.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: But what time of the day is it, because I know.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Party time.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Very, very close to what time it is. I know sundown, sunup.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, it's sundown. I'd say with the time it took you to scavenge the bodies, about 30 or 40 minutes after the sun's set completely.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What time does the sun set?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh Jesus Christ. Garmin over here.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are you trying to figure out if the stores are still open?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Does it look dark? Of course I am.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We can't ask Siri here, we don't know.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's the feat I took. It's Siri. Does it look like stores are open? That's all I'm asking.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, probably. I mean, in this district, shops are still open past sundown for a little bit, but the later in the evening it gets, many of them close down. Some shops stay open later, you don't know.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Let's go to this room party you are talking about.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, to get the spider inside the hotel, we'll need a clever disguise for it. A hat, a beard, perhaps.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Good call. I'll get out my disguise kit and put a mustache on the spider.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Also, Nott, mask up for sure, yeah? For sure. Maybe earmuffs, it's very cold.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I could do a spell and make myself look like someone else.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That did not work very well for me several hours ago, I think maybe you want to use tangible things here. Use the earmuffs, use the hat, use the mask.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Mask and earmuffs should make me look

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You also have a hood, so it's nighttime, with the hood up, in the dark, yeah?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I like it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's really bright and shiny in the hotel, though.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: If I may, you raise a good point, Nott. If we for some reason get caught being where we're not supposed to, I think that writ only allows us to kill this beast and return it for the coin.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, we're not supposed to be here.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I would not want to gamble with our reward of 700 gold. Perhaps we should leave and collect our reward and then find our revelries elsewhere.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I mean, to be fair, we know how to get here through the sewers now, we can always come back.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: This is a good point.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Should we just make it straight--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Make a beeline?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Just go straight and just stay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We can walk.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, let's go straight out and leave and go to the Crownsguard.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, the King's Hall.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Let's do it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe we should shut the gate up and then lock it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Good idea.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So they don't know.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you remark it, you close it. You guys step out into the main street, and you've traveled through here before, you immediately think, oh that's where the nearest exit gate in the direction of the hall would be. You guys get about a block before two of the patrolling crownsguard stop and look at this troupe of people walking with a giant, brutalized spider, bright white and blue.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Dinner.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Immediately jogs up, both of them. "Excuse me, what are you doing here?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh yes, don't worry, we're staying at the Pillow Trove, but we have this very beautiful writ.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And you are a motley lot. Going through all of you, sneering a bit in the direction of Caleb.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I have a hood on.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. A bit frightened at the vision of Yasha, and confused at the sight of Mollymauk. He finishes reading the writ. "Okay, very well, but we will escort you to the gates and you can "continue this on to the hall."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Thank you!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "How did you get this in here?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, we are really powerful.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We're the Mighty Nein.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We killed it! We took care of the monster problem.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Looks back at the other guard, and they share a brief glance. "Right, very well. Let us "leave, then." They escort you towards the entrance. The opening gate where you guys had passed through, you move through and out into the Interstead Sprawl, at the exact gates where you guys had entered, or you had entered, and you had attempted the night before.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, on the way there, too, I also turn to one of these guards and say, excuse me, could you point me where we are, right now, which way to the Nestled Nook from here. You've heard of this bookstore?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I didn't, well, the Nestled Nook, did you say?"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You don't have to pretend with me, it's fine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He points over that way, he goes, "To the south side of the Silken Terrace, look for the "small greenish hut-looking building."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This is not normally how we dress, ugh, we were in the sewers.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They escort you out. (laughs) Get you quickly out of the district carrying a giant, bloodied, awful-looking spider. As you're making your way, some of the folks that are walking through start gasping at the sight, and whispering to each other, pointing. Some begin to approach, and somebody else grabs their shoulder, and pulls them back. You become this slow-moving sight through this district.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, Mighty Nein, stay back.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, you guys eventually make your way back to the hall.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You know, I grew up with this language.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you're outside the King's Hall. As you approach, some of the guards rush up to you and, "Hail! What do you carry and bring here to the-- What is this thing?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: These papers? Oh, that's a spider.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The evil monster that was killing everything.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, you might want to send someone to collect your dead too, by the by.

lines.name: TRAVIS, TALIESIN
lines.text: Quite a few.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You bring him in. Some more of the guards begin to gather around and then Voloshin is pulled from his interior office somewhere. As he steps forward he says, "All right, they tell me--oh, "goodness me! That's a beastie." He tugs on the end of his chin beard for a second. "So this is it, "this is the one?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Indeed, in fact it would turn invisible when it wasn't trying to stick its fangs into all of our gang.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (shouting) "Someone wake up Cloen!"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Who the hell is Cloyde?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Cloen, and he was the one survived--"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Cloyde?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Cloen.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Cloyne?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Cloine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Clo-en.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That is not what I heard at all.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: With that accent, all those letters disappear.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There's also an egg sac that got taken care of.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my gosh, lots and lots and lots of baby spiders.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "What's going on, I-- oh! That thing, that's the "thing!" He looks immediately scared. He goes, "Great, send him back to bed. Well, that's "what we needed."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Send him back to bed? You should let that guy go for leave for medical absence, that's rough, man.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You look like just the person I would take advice from when it comes to administrating my people."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Don't punch him, don't, no.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, he's got a fair point. I'll give him that.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You don't look like an administrator, I mean, that's actually almost a compliment.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You know, yeah, it's fair.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'm impressed, I will go ahead and retrieve your payments to the Mighty Seven."

lines.name: LAURA, TRAVIS
lines.text: Nein.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'm sorry to hear that, that's terrible."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Extra pay would soften the blow.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh yeah. I'm moderately okay at this! Oh no!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, come on! Oh, it's not too bad.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay, deception, where the fuck is it? Oh, it's 11.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He goes, "That's really too bad. Anyway, I'll be right back."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We have armor too, of some of your fallen people, will you reward us for that, thank you!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, you can buy it back for us or we can go pawn it, your choice.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That is property of the Crown, thank you very much."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, unfortunately, it's property in her bag right now, and it's real tough to get out of that bag.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Beau!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Don't tell them about the bag.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Stop it, we're about to get our reward, stop being a shithead right now.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sorry, fair.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "If you would be as kind to remember these fallen soldiers who protect you and the people of "this city, by delivering unto us the armor and weaponry that they had been lost with, I would be "happy to go forward with delivering your reward."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Who picked up all those items, anyway?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I have them. Here's two sets of armor.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Two of the guards collect them.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And two extra helmets.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm hanging back and giving Identify a whirl on what's in my bag. That other armor. Outside.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ooh.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Travis will never see that card.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He comes back. They bring a small chest.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The card that says "give to Travis."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Thank you very much, and I appreciate that," and he sets it out and hands it to you. "So. You seem able-bodied. You've pulled through on something "where few have been able to. If you're looking for more work, I'm sure we'll have things. Bit light "at the moment, but where can we find you, if we're looking for you?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We're staying over at the--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Leaky Tap.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Although some of us were taking up at a room at the--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: At the Pillow Trove, yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughing) "Of course you do. Leaky Tap, good to know. All right, now shove off."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What does that mean, "of course you do?"

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, of course you do.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: She has a room there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Of course she does.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I have a room.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ah. Fair play. Now, shove off.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 700 gold.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As the Herald turns and Voloshin's there, the guards gather the armor and the weapons and stuff.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Just the armor. I didn't give back the swords.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Good to know.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Nice.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Stick it to the man.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hell yeah!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She's older, her face is weathered and has seen some time. She's wearing robes of gold and white, but they seem to be not ceremonial, or at least worn enough to the point where they look like they're worn for comfort. She steps forward, and she has these warm brown eyes that peek through this face. "Sorry to "bother all of you. Word just came to me that you were successful in taking care of this beast in "the sewers. I am Lawmaster Orentha and I just wanted to extend my thanks. It's not often that "folks are willing to go to lengths and put their lives on the line for the honor of those fallen of "the Crownsguard, and those within the Hall of the King, so I just wanted to say I appreciate that."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Of course. We appreciate the law in this town, and the services you provide. You can lean on us for any further needs you might have.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "The Crown appreciates it, the people of the city appreciate it, and I appreciate it. Thank "you." She turns around and shuffles back into the hallway. Everyone goes about their business again and begins shoving you off towards the door.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: She seemed really nice.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Why did all those people want to rebel against her?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: She's still a part of the system.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She seems nice, though.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, they're nice individually sometimes, but they're still a part of a shitty whole. A real shithole.

lines.name: LAURA, TRAVIS
lines.text: "A shitty hole."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: There's not a lot of shades of gray in your world, are there? It's just shit, or not shit.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's been a long day.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughs) "A shitty hole."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What's the casting time on Identify again?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: As a ritual, it's 11 minutes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys would be exiting the building just as you've finished that process. You complete it, take a moment to think it over, and you hear them all exiting and talking to themselves, as they're ribbing Beau on the way out. You quickly gather your things.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Look, I don't mean to have resting bitch face, okay?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, but it hasn't changed at all.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm working on it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: If anything, later in the day it gets worse. I'm just letting you know.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's not so much restive as active.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes, it's like working bitch face.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's cool.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The bag's closed. You don't see shit.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You're real quick.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I heard you coming. You're loud. You're a lot. And that's Liam to Marisha.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are we each taking 100 gold?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Everyone take 100 gold.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Look at that. That's brilliant.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We did it, and we never have to do another adventure again. Right?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't know about you, I've got goals.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Campaign three, next week.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yup. That was it, thank you for watching.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm working towards something.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Towards something? What?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Something.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What?!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Buy me a drink and I'll tell you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What's the plan now?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We all smell like poop!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: To go to this place?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Bathhouse?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, we are going to The Pillow House,

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, but we should probably get cleaned up, because they're just going to stop us the minute we get inside. Should we go and see Pumat Sol, and see if he'll make us clean?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We do have some extra coin. Maybe he's got some fancier shit to buy.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Also, as long as we're in here-- I couldn't get in earlier, but we're here now-- there is a stop. I wanted you to go with me.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We're not in the Tri-Spires anymore.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Where are we now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys are back at the King's Hall, back in the Interstead Sprawl.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's a bummer.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We got to shower.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: For someone who knows the exact time of night, you are shit with directions.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's up to him, not me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I thought I was pretty clear. Everyone else got it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Liam is very different than Caleb.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You know memory is different than being able to tell the time of day by the sun, right?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Hm? No, I remember everything that happens in the last month.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, that's fine, but time of day.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Time of day, I know. That's part of the feat. I know the hour of the day.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's bananas. You should be able to look at the sun and say, "oh, six."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I am so cheating by following the rules in the book.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's still early evening-ish.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Dinner, and bad decisions, and cleanliness would be great.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We have to get not stinky before we eat, okay?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Agreed. Should we head back, clean up?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sounds good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys, easy enough, find your way back to The Leaky Tap, where you can utilize the washroom to get yourselves back to a personable state.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: On the stroll: Fjord?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I want to talk to you about how that went back there. Can we walk alone for a minute?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Sure, if you'd like.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Let's drag back. Two things. One is, I didn't bring it up, even though maybe Beauregard knows, but I found something in there that I think is up your alley. I found some armor, beyond just crownsguard armor, down there. I mean, listen, my friend. You spit out salt water. You've got a sword that's covered in fucking anemones and shit.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm not repeating that word.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You'd be very good with that glove, but I feel like I would like to have that glove, and I would love for you to have this armor. I took a look at it while you guys were inside, and it would allow you to move freely in the ocean or in rivers or lakes, underwater, and keep you safe in water.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You seem to trust in me enough to tell me about it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I don't trust you yet. I don't trust any of these people yet, except for-- No, I don't trust any of these people yet.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's too bad.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ja

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Sure. You know, we've all harmed people, but I hope that you will learn to trust me, in time, and I appreciate you sharing that. Here, I'm fairly certain that you will do far more damage with this than my shitty attempt did.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Of course. Thanks for the armor. What does it look like? (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's no arms to it, other than the bracer plates right there, there's no sleeve. There you go. It's got an arm guard and a bracer there, shoulder piece, the torso portion, a couple of plates that go over that, and some leg guards.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: All good things. Thank you for this.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Thank you. No, you've go to go higher.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, you're welcome.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Don't want to interrupt your "broment."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, hi. You want to be part of the bro moment? Or a Beau moment?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm not here. I am not here.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I thought you were, I thought you'd walked up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are we going to bed, or are we what?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What are you guys doing?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We're going to get clean first, because good god, we're going to clear out that fucking tavern.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We'll say you got clean for the expediency of the story. We don't have to roleplay through your bathing individually.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: But Matt--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Unless you really want to. Always stop me if you want to have a moment.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We went to the bathhouse to get clean?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, you went back to The Leaky Tap.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: By the way, part of the reason I didn't wash up at The Leaky Tap is because, in medieval times, they didn't have baths. I thought, this isn't the Sheraton, they don't have a bath.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We're pretending that there's a bath.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This isn't medieval times. In the fantasy world, it's a weird mixture of different time periods, and when I say they have a washroom, I mean it's a basin with water that is replaced every couple hours that people communally come up and wash in. It's not the cleanest water, and it's probably been used by other people as well, and if you bathe fully in it, it might be changed before the next two or three people use it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I was under the assumption that you had to be de Rolo level to have a bath in your house.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's what I'm saying. But it's functional.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's why we should have gone to Pumat Sol's.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's why people have bathhouses, to clean up.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: When Fjord's taking a bath, I'm going to go through his stuff and try to find his letter.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: His letter?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The letter for the Solstryce Academy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Go ahead and make a stealth check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Not good. 15.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 15? Would you have taken your stuff in with you?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Or would I still be in the room?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Molly would probably still be in the room.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I got to stealth past Molly, or get him out of the room.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do. Make a perception check, Molly.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm certainly not trying to hide it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's call that a 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You watch as Nott slowly creeps into the room, heading over towards Fjord's pack.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ooh.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Whatcha doing?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (yells) There's no liquor in here, oh boy, I better go down to the bar.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What were you looking for?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Nothing. Liquor.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Were you looking for this? I hold up a folded piece of paper.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (gasps)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What will you give me for it?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll give you a whole gold piece.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, something-- I don't want money, I want something, give me something.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Two

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Not gold pieces. What do you have?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I have a vial of acid.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What is this?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's a blank piece of paper.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Maybe it's invisible ink.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I hand back the acid. Don't try and go through his stuff, you're just going to get caught.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What did we talk about grumpy people?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You're right, he's not very grumpy. He should be. If I barfed up salt water every morning I would be grumpy.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Maybe if he spends more time around Beau he'll get grumpier.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Grumpy-ass wingman makes me look better in comparison.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I mean.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And I walk out the door. And I walk by him. She's going through your stuff, by the way.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Who? Which one?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I've already walked away.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Get out!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm sorry!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Son of a

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. You finish your baths, you all convene down in the tavern. Yeah. When you guys come down there and begin to reconvene, about two tables away you see, sitting alone with a tankard, a familiar dwarven figure to both Beau and Fjord.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, wait.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ulog, who you had met before.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ulog?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ulog, with a "G".

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, Ulog! Not "lok"?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The dwarf, from the Knights of Requital.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, with the buzzed head.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you watch as you guys approach and as soon as you all gather at the table, he gets up and walks over.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He was the one who was super not-cool with us being there, super angry.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He seemed to be, yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wife Illiana, into it!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He walks behind where Fjord and Beau are and goes, "Don't mean to bother you, but if I could have a moment of your time, I'd like to talk."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Of course.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, man.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Excuse us." He leads you guys back to where the cellar is.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (quietly) Don't talk.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys head back, he nods over towards your dragonborn bartender, gives him a nod, walks past, leads you down to the same cellar, it's dark in there. There's no light, but he lights a hooded lantern as you enter and it gives this low, mysterious atmosphere in the shadows as he spins around and goes, "I've been watching you a bit. You're a curious lot. More of you than came to the meeting. Five more. Did you-- and please, be honest, I'm good at telling otherwise-- did you reveal any of our sentiments to your-- of our moot to your companions?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No we did not.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Went and saw you come back to town with this spider-beast you had on your shoulders, now that's-- take it you're pretty good with a sword, maybe? With a bow? Experienced? What's your skill sets, if I might ask, beyond just being curious?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, we come from all sorts of different backgrounds. I happen to be very handy at sea, know my way around a merchant area. Beau?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm pretty good with this here bo. Pretty good fighter. Named Beau. It's a little redundant, to be totally honest.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That's a little strange, not going to lie."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's kind of obnoxious.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yeah."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sometimes it irritates me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Understood."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Curse upon ye who made that decision for you."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "So you can move quickly, without a ruckus, you say?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: At times, we can be quite quiet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "And your friends, do they share our sentiments?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I would say it's safe to say that they don't have sentiments opposed to yours.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Indifference is a pretty strong sentiment.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Give you more information about what's going on, and you can say yes or no at your leisure. But I think we have a chance to really do something good in this city. To change part of the status quo. To root out some of the unworthy at the top. Think on it."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Just letting you know that coin always helps, but we did see the posting outside the King's Hall about uprisings against the Empire. It seems the heat on your group might be quite intense.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There are a handful in this town and their time is up."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What cancers are you looking to remove? I would tell you that tomorrow night, the devil lies in the details, and that will depend.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Your curiosity is piqued. Come by. We'll talk."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What makes you think that now is the right time for all of this?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Good night."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Good night.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (shouting) Oh god, stubbed my toe!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Wow. That was really good. Like, you didn't act like a total shitfuck.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Thanks. I was trying to not show my emotions on my face.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Whatever it was, yeah, lock it in. That was great. Really nice.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, thank you. I'm trying to get better at it. Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That was promising.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What do you think?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: About that? I mean, shit, I can't really speak to it. I have to figure out what they want to do tomorrow.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: In my experience, it doesn't matter if he thinks he's fucking with the Empire or not. The Empire is going to look at it as fucking with them, and that never ends well.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's right. If it's amateur hour, we're going to be shooting ourselves in the foot.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Last thing we want to do is take the fall for these assholes.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No joke. Especially since we just got here.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And he's talking like he wants us to be the fist to his voice. What the fuck is that?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, what the fuck?

lines.name: MARISHA, TRAVIS
lines.text: (sigh)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Beer?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah. Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. You guys reconvene with the rest of the group.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So. I walked in and the guy was like-- you know, he had his arms above his head, he was chained to the bed, right? He didn't know where he left the key! I know I don't even know how long he'd been there.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well he forgot that he put it there! You think you'd still feel that.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, people will pay for all sorts of weird things.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wow.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, hi guys!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Hey.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: 'Sup.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I wasn't sure what our next engagement might be, but it seems like we might not have to wait that long.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Did we get another job offer?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, not through the city per se, but remember that group that we joined the other day?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The cult? The

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No that is not at all, no, no. We joined their meeting, right? We did not join them, we didn't participate--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We sampled.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We were in the presence of an attended meeting of individuals.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So they offered you money?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: More of a voyeuristic position that we're talking about here.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They offered you money to join in.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Maybe it's just us, we just go, fuck these other--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No no no!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What do they want you to do?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You kept your eyes wide shut, is what you're saying.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Come on, what's the fidelio?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well done! Oh, that was terrible.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Tomorrow evening there's going to be a meeting of that same group and they would like to hire our services.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Don't you think it's stupid to say all of this right here?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Why? Am I speaking real loud?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Are we in the tavern?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys are in the tavern at the table, but you're keeping your voices somewhat discreet.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is anyone watching?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No one seems to be paying immediate attention.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do you want me to write it down?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Tomorrow at midnight, we're going to see what it is they want to do, and if the money's right and if it's not stupid.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: "If the money's right and if it's not stupid" is a good philosophy for this group.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How can we be sure he's telling the truth?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He didn't tell us a lot of anything.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But how do you know that he isn't setting you up to be turned into the Crownsguard?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Exactly what she said.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We don't all need to be down in the same place.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We can have my cat tomorrow to link the two groups.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Where's your cat?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh boy, he got kicked to shit today.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sorry, I didn't mean to--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Like kicked to death?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, you know, it's hazy because he's never really kicked to death, he's just kicked off of the material plane.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He got kicked into another dimension!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm not going to lie, it does hurt when he's gone, but I always know he can come back if I have the coin.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Was it one kick? Just one.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, it's not funny.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's a little funny. Frumpkin has a good sense of humor about it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You'd have to, you get kicked into a fucking other dimension.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But who kicks a fucking cat?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Exactly! Who kicks a fucking cat exactly is my point! You can do a lot of things and have a very bad day but who kicks a cat?!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Did you get a name or a face, I mean, are we going--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We'll beat his ass later.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Maybe.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We'll beat his ass later.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, it's inevitable if you kick a cat you're going to end badly. That's just how it works.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I mean you might as well be at home picking the wings off flies, you kick a cat, what is wrong with you?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wait a minute, is it wrong to pick wings off flies? Because that's not--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's really hard to do, very small and hard to catch.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Not if they're already dead, then you can pick the wings off super duper easily.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh sure, if they're already dead, just go for it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You know what we used to do as kids, we used to take fireflies and crush them and make glow jewelry. When they'd light up, and you'd crush them right as they light up, and then you can make glowing war paint.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What's a firefly?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's a thing that happens on the east coast.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And in the south.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, it's a southern thing.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And in New Jersey.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh wow.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is this a thing that really happens?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: On second thought, who am I to judge? It's fine! You know, Frumpkin will be back tomorrow morning because I am going to stay up late and do what I have to do, but aren't we going to have a rager tonight at this place in the fancy part of town?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh yeah, we can go back to the Pillow Trove and all hang out and sleep in the same room if you want.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Wait, so we all just got clean and we're going to get back into the sewers to get to the Tri-Spires?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is this room that you rented gigantic?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, it's kind of little, actually. You guys, it's really little, actually.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: But really nice, you said?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But you paid for it!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You paid for it! You know, you don't want it to go to waste. There's probably a very nice sitting room or tavern or something underneath this place. It's a shame to let it go to waste.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah we all look nice enough, they might let us in. If not, let's all go--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Kill them.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What? What?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm kidding.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Sure, we walk back to the guards and I show them the key. Can we get in?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: For the sake of brevity? Since it's getting late and I want us to get to a good ending point tonight, they will let you in but nobody else.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: But she paid for the whole night with all of us!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's a posse!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I try to look him right in the eye when I say that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's not the same guards you met before, and they take your key but they look towards the rather rough-looking, large, scary barbarian woman, they look towards the very shifty-looking multicolored tiefling they look past the, while he is wearing a cloak, still rough, grimy-looking wizard, and they begin to fixate directly on the tiny green, but white mask-skinned halfling creature thing in earmuffs that's squinting very hard and they begin to really pry in that direction before you start thinking this is not going to go well if I keep going--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, maybe-- Don't let us hold you down, if you want to go enjoy?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, I don't really want to stay in there alone.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How about we dive bar it tonight, then?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Being alone is sucky, right?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Roll for random bar.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You know one dive.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The Evening Nip.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No work, let's go make an ass of ourselves at the Evening Nip.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, no questions. Just scouting them out. Yeah yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Scout it out. I think that's a great idea.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (singing) Bar wars, nothing but bar wars!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Easy enough to find! You head to another section of the Interstead sprawl--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Have we been here yet?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You see these thicker human guys, one who is completely bald, pale skin, big square chin that looks like it's been broken in multiple places who has his arms crossed. The other one looks to be a spindly guy who's sitting there, daggers sheathed on both sides, and they both watch you as you enter and they both just stare.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: They're bouncers, like rough bouncers at

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. Which is interesting, because you expect for them to go through that it would be a really rowdy place but it's very quiet. You walk inside and aside from the central candle-lit chandelier that is almost obtrusively laid from a low ceiling with a number of small booths that are built out of wood as well, it has a classic Old-England pub feel, but everything smells of dried beers and ale and rotted wood. You only see two other patrons in there that are at separate booths drinking alone, and across the way you see this very, very old dwarf with half of his beard burned away and this perpetual grimace. He's sitting there looking out. As you enter, he perks up, "Aye. Can I help you?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He's the bartender?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We'll take a round of your house ale, if you don't mind.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Start a tab, we're looking to tie one on tonight. We're celebrating.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "If I can ask what you're celebrating?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Killed a fucking giant invisible spider, friend.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Drinks coming right up." He goes and gets you guys a number of drinks. The basest, most bitter ale you've had, but it's functional.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I appreciate that. Can I ask your name?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "They call me Clive."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Clive.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Clive Bens, and this is my bar."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nice to meet you, Clive.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Pleasure as well."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Noticed some tough-looking types out front.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Don't want to be taken advantage of."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You been hit by any riots?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No, but that's why. I keep my front." His eyes are locked in on you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I was about to say, why--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I know, I know!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Does he look, like, mean at Fjord?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, it's just kind of creepy.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He's just locked in.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hey, is green your favorite color or something?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Sorry, just don't get a lot of your types in here."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What is his type?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Orc-ish blood.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Pretty."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Pretty! See, Fjord, you're just so handsome.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Thank you, Jester. Clive, we're not looking for any trouble.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Enjoy." He slips them out.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Thanks, man.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: This place sucks.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, maybe not the best place to celebrate, just putting it out there.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That guy is socially awkward.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is there any music or is it just low murmured conversation?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's no conversation. Two people at separate booths that are drinking by themselves and they're all looking at you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, what do they look like?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We walked into the Russian Mafia!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah we did! This is a mob bar.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This is Fight Club, really.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do you have a menu? You don't, you don't.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do you have any beers on tap? Oh no, just the two? Okay. Interesting. Feels like this is a front.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's two other guys, one of them is a younger, plump human male, has a tuft of a red and grey goatee at the end of his chin. No hair on top of his head. The other guy looks to be human as well, he's older in his forties, he glances over at you, he's clutching a tankard, and you can see he has a very familiar tattoo around his neck.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The tattoo is familiar or he's familiar?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The tattoo. It's not him, but it's the tattoo.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Show me your tats.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. You don't know if it's directly the same, but it's a similar tattoo to Thed who you met earlier.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe you should ask him about his tattoos since you have tattoos as well.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Just because someone has tattoos doesn't mean they know everyone who has a tattoo. These are very different tattoos.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Does the floor look barren? Wood? Any rugs, coverings?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: How big is this place?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This place is maybe 20 feet by 30 feet. It's very small. The floor appears to be wood boards, there are a couple doors that leave into a kitchen or storage area. It's a tiny fucking dive.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Like, unless we're going to do this we should get out.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Should we just do this, then?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We did a little recon.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah. Maybe we finish our drink and move on for now.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Just go back to The Leaky Tap and then, you know.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We learned something today.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Have we slept after our spider bite?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys finish your terrible ale, and you leave.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This is awful, and I don't want it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I pound it for her.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Thanks for coming by, have a good night."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Thank you, Clive Bens!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys leave, and the two guards watch you leave.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Nobody wants to stay? (laughter)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do you want to stay, Yasha? I'll stay with you if you want.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I quite like it here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm thirsty and have been out of water and I keep going to drink nothing that's there. I do it so much and I hate it!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can someone fly us in some water for the DM?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's fine! Because as you--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are these your type of people?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I do like these people a lot.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Let's play for another six hours.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Six more hours? Let's make it so they have to break this into like five YouTube videos.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Do you guys leave?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes, we leave. Take it away, Matt.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It is 11:00, we'll pick up next week as you guys are leaving the Evening Nip to whatever other business you want to go towards.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We learned so much today, you guys.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I feel like we all grew as people.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I don't want to stop!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I know, I feel like it's just at home and we can just like--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Keep going. Feel like we were on a roll!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Can we do it just us at home?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: With some quiches, and some mimosas--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Some lox and bagels!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I feel like it would be wonderful, and I feel like there would be a lot of very angry, disappointed people.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Charlie the dog.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Charlie farting in the corner.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He's so stinky now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I know, he's old and stinky!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah if anyone wants to come see me sing a cappella at the University of Virginia on Saturday night--

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: What?!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Anyway, good night, guys!

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: What?!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's not a surprise! Sam has deep a cappella roots! You all know that!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll be performing in a college a cappella concert on Saturday night.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You are not.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's so cool!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Where in Virginia?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Charlottesville.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What's the address, though?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't know the address.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: University of Virginia, you'll find it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: [music]
